story:
SweetSmarts is a series of educational games aimed at young minds, through the use of tablet and mobile gaming. It is created and being developed by Dreamwinter Games.

Some quick key featues of the SweetSmarts series:

  • The games are colorful, non-violent, and very easy to use and understand.
  • Intiutive gameplay and controls.
  • Each game has strong focus in a different area of educational and mental exercise.
  • The gameplay is attractive and entertaining enough to keep a young minds attention while still being useful to their cognative strengthening.
  • The games are designed to grow with age and skill, difficulty levels and challange modes allow all age groups to enjoy the games.

 

Please take a minute to look over this fundraiser and the goals of this project.

We are looking for funding to help get the first series of games in the hands of parents and young minds alike, and you can help by funding the project directly.

If this project isn't for you, maybe you know someone else who might be interested? Help to spread the word by sharing this with your friends, posting on Twitter or Facebook.

Any support for this project is greatly appreciated!



As of right now, SweetSmarts is already in development, some games are already playable (although they lack a bit of polish) and in prototype form! The first batch of games to launch contain five games. Here is a brief overview of those first five games:

Note: The images shown below do not reflect the final versions of the games as they are still in development.

SweetSmarts: Mathflash

(Currently in development)
An arithmetic based game where you solve simple problems in your head, increasing your difficulty as time moves on, or even challenging yourself with speed runs and score tracking!


SweetSmarts: MonsterMatchup

(Currently in development)
A memory strengthening game where you have several mini-games to choose from matching up various adorable monsters with their shadows, themselves, and even help to piece monsters together!







SweetSmarts: MathBlaster (working title)

A space based shooter where you defend your town from falling mathematical problems! This game takes skill, quick reflexes and offers many modes for a wide range of ages - including adults!

SweetSmarts: Alphabet Bandit

A stealthy raccoon has stolen letters from all over town! This word based game helps children learn how to spell and identify objects as they move through town tracking the nefarious bandit who quite literally has left the town speechless!

SweetSmarts: FlickFisherman

This game teaches hand-eye-ear coordination by making the player rely on sound or visual cues which change dynamically in order to catch the fish. With several mini-games and difficulty levels, this game is fun for all ages - including adults!







Over the course of their lifetime, all SweetSmarts games will be made to be released on the platforms listed below:
  • PC (At launch)
  • Android Mobile (At launch)
  • Windows 8 Mobile
  • Mac
  • Android Tablets 
  • Apple iOS Mobile
  • Apple iOS Tablets
  • Facebook

 

Dreamwinter Games was founded in 2012 by Michael Miller, an indie game designer from Salt Lake City, Utah. A few things to know about Dreamwinter Games.

  • Founded in 2012.
  • Strongly supports the Indie Developer community.
  • Focus on fun, non-violent gaming.
  • Read more about Dreamwinter here.

 

Whether you donate to this project, share it with your friends on Twitter/Facebook, or just took the time to read and understand our project goals, I want to say thank you for your support.

Community projects like this and crowdfunding options have really opened up a new way for developers to reach out from beyond their small in-home studios and change the way technology, social interaction, and education is shaped. Without you guys, none of this would be possible.

Thank you.
story_txt:
SweetSmarts is a series of educational games aimed at young minds, through the use of tablet and mobile gaming. It is created and being developed by Dreamwinter Games.
Some quick key featues of the SweetSmarts series:

The games are colorful, non-violent, and very easy to use and understand.
Intiutive gameplay and controls.
Each game has strong focus in a different area of educational and mental exercise.
The gameplay is attractive and entertaining enough to keep a young minds attention while still being useful to their cognative strengthening.
The games are designed to grow with age and skill, difficulty levels and challange modes allow all age groups to enjoy the games.
 

Please take a minute to look over this fundraiser and the goals of this project.We are looking for funding to help get the first series of games in the hands of parents and young minds alike, and you can help by funding the project directly.If this project isn't for you, maybe you know someone else who might be interested? Help to spread the word by sharing this with your friends, posting on Twitter or Facebook.Any support for this project is greatly appreciated!
As of right now, SweetSmarts is already in development, some games are already playable (although they lack a bit of polish) and in prototype form! The first batch of games to launch contain five games. Here is a brief overview of those first five games:Note: The images shown below do not reflect the final versions of the games as they are still in development.
SweetSmarts: Mathflash
(Currently in development)An arithmetic based game where you solve simple problems in your head, increasing your difficulty as time moves on, or even challenging yourself with speed runs and score tracking!





SweetSmarts: MonsterMatchup
(Currently in development)


A memory strengthening game where you have several mini-games to choose from matching up various adorable monsters with their shadows, themselves, and even help to piece monsters together!
SweetSmarts: MathBlaster (working title)
A space based shooter where you defend your town from falling mathematical problems! This game takes skill, quick reflexes and offers many modes for a wide range of ages - including adults!
SweetSmarts: Alphabet Bandit
A stealthy raccoon has stolen letters from all over town! This word based game helps children learn how to spell and identify objects as they move through town tracking the nefarious bandit who quite literally has left the town speechless!
SweetSmarts: FlickFisherman

This game teaches hand-eye-ear coordination by making the player rely on sound or visual cues which change dynamically in order to catch the fish. With several mini-games and difficulty levels, this game is fun for all ages - including adults!
Over the course of their lifetime, all SweetSmarts games will be made to be released on the platforms listed below:

PC (At launch)
Android Mobile (At launch)
Windows 8 Mobile
Mac
Android Tablets 
Apple iOS Mobile
Apple iOS Tablets
Facebook
 

Dreamwinter Games was founded in 2012 by Michael Miller, an indie game designer from Salt Lake City, Utah. A few things to know about Dreamwinter Games.

Founded in 2012.
Strongly supports the Indie Developer community.
Focus on fun, non-violent gaming.
Read more about Dreamwinter here.
 

Whether you donate to this project, share it with your friends on Twitter/Facebook, or just took the time to read and understand our project goals, I want to say thank you for your support.Community projects like this and crowdfunding options have really opened up a new way for developers to reach out from beyond their small in-home studios and change the way technology, social interaction, and education is shaped. Without you guys, none of this would be possible.Thank you.

story:
Meriwether Lewis, of the Lewis and Clark Expedition,
described them as "fluffy blue perfectionists."


These adorable turquoise cryptids are the stars of Not Without You, a diabolically clever game from award-winning indie studio Bad Pilcrow (Vanessa Saint-Pierre Delacroix & Her Nightmare).  Their most striking feature?  They all move in unison!  Working collectively, these creatures must occupy all escape hatches simultaneously, in order to flee the well-secured laboratory of Dr. F. W. Nervoso.

Sounds cool!  Tell me more...

Not Without You is a fresh, modern take on classic puzzle mechanics.  It is accessible to gamers of all ages, yet challenging enough for hardened problem-solvers.  Not Without You also features an intuitive drag-and-drop level editor.  Upload your creations for the world to enjoy, or play levels submitted by others!

The game includes the following features:

  • 27 Story Mode Levels
  • 18 Bonus Challenge Levels
  • Dozens of Downloadable Levels
  • Drag-and-Drop Level Editor

Not Without You has already begun receiving accolades, having been selected for the Boston Indie Showcase at PAX East 2012!

In short, the game has enormous potential, and it deserves an enormous release.  That's where you come in!  Your contribution to our fundraising campaign ensures that Not Without You will see the light of day.  You can make the game a success by helping us offset the costs of licensing the Unity game engine.  Unity will allow us to release the game as widely as possible - via PC, iOS, Android, Mac, and the Web.  


How close are we to completing the game?  Pretty darn close.  Completed versions for Windows Phone 7 and Xbox LIVE Indie Games exist (however, they have not been released yet - patience!).  We've already begun porting the game to Unity, and we're only missing a few features.  Our goal is to have Not Without You finished and ready for distribution this Summer. 

How will the funds be utilized?

Here is the breakdown of how your contributions will be applied (in order):
  • 1 Android Add-On License for Unity ($400)
  • 1 iOS Add-On License for Unity ($400)
  • 1 Unity Pro License ($1,500)
  • Marketing and Promotion

We believe strongly in this title, and we hope you do, too!  Together, we can put it in the hands of as many gamers as possible.  

     

About Bad Pilcrow

What's a Pilcrow, you ask?  It's that funny-looking backwards P with two stems - the paragraph symbol that won't go away when you hit that one button in Microsoft Word.  Just like the break between paragraphs indicates that a writer wants to change topics, our studio wants to change the way you think about games.  Clever, eh?  Eh?!

It's already begun.  Our most recent game, Vanessa Saint-Pierre Delacroix & Her Nightmare, has collected some pretty prestigious accolades of late: Best Design in the 2010 Independent Game Developers Competition, Professional Finalist in the 2011 Indie Game Challenge, and Finalist in the 2011 PAX 10 showcase. 

So, if you've ever longed for the strange and wonderful games of your childhood, lamented at the over-abundance of war-inspired first-person shooters, or thought maybe, just maybe, video games could be BETTER, more INNOVATIVE, and more FUN, then Bad Pilcrow might just be the company for you!

story:
Umbala Minions is a game with an unusual story. It is a Wizard-inspired tower defence RPG with a twist for IOS, Android, Windows Phone, Browser and Windows.

If you'd played Plants VS Zombies, it's similar to that but we've changed a lot of game mechanics that will make it even better. 

Story

During the fantasy medieval age, there is a kingdom, named Operus. This kingdom is having it's golden age. The people are happy without worrying anything. But this kingdom's golden age will soon come to an end. The king named Ops made a mistake. He angered a powerful wizard and made the colourful kingdom colourless. 
The king sends out his legion of colourful soldiers to stop the evil wizard. To protect his castle, the Wizard sends his Umbala minions. Their goal is to prevent soldiers to reach the castle while the tower is absorbing all the colours in the kingdom. The future of him is in your hands. 

Gameplay
You will control the Umbala Minions. You are the antagonist. Your goal to protect the castle that is absorbing all the colours of the Operus kingdom. You need to prevent all soldiers whose main goal is to destroy the castle to bring colours back to the kingdom. Do you think you have what it takes to protect the wizard? We'll see. 
We have two types of game modes. The first one is the Endless mode where all the people will attack the castle one by one. You need to attack them base on their colour. You need to match their colour from the colour of the minions. If you didn't attack them with the correct colour, We have different types of characters. Below are the types of characters that will be part of our game.
-Umbala minions
They have different colour powers which will be used to attack the enemies. 

-Absorber
It has 3 layers of colours. Medium speed but has the ability to absorb the wrong colour. The wrong colour will be added to the layers until it becomes impossible to kill. 
Example:
The absorber has red, blue and green colours. If you hit it with blue, the monster has now 4 layers of colour namely, red, blue, green and blue. You need to hit it with the correct colour sequence. Concept art to follow. 
-Villagers


It has 1 layer of colour. Medium speed and can only be hit by the right colour.
-Soldier
Two layers of colours. Slow speed because of it's armour. You need to hit it with the correct colour sequence.  Concept art to follow. 
-Guardian

-3 layers of colours. Has two modes: move and defend. Slow speed because of the heavy shield.
-Quack Doctor
one layer of colour. Can buff other characters for more speed. Will only spawn if there's a character in front of him. Concept art to follow. 
-Village Captain
Has 3 villagers in front of him. If the 3 villagers get killed, he will run away. If he is killed, grants extra experience that will be stored in the castle. He makes everything in the platform he's on faster. One layer of colour. Fast speed.
-Color switching Lady
3 layer of colours. Switches colour randomly upon hit, Copies the nearest monster. Medium speed.Concept art to follow. 
-Slime monster
Two layer of colours. If explodes, will create small slime monsters. Concept art to follow. 
smaller slime monster

-Spawns in different colours. Fast speed.
and many more...


Aesthetics

We plan to use modern 2D art style suitable for mobile and PC. We want to make sure that the game will be appealing.


Why we need funds?

This is a large project and we need funds to support it. We are just a start up and only supported by a college teacher. We need funds to pay for our bills and also to feed ourselves. We are a group of 10 people who have the same dreams: To create games. 


Rewards

We want to rewarding our backers generously. They will be personally given a thank you card that will be sent to their mails or E-Mails. Rewards will be posted as we progress with the game. We would like to offer also the following:
If you donate 30 USD, You will receive a limited edition Shirt. 

75 USD Donation(You will receive a Limited edition Xorcas Hoodie)



About us:

Xorcas Games is a small start-up game development company composes of 10 people. We focus on Mobile games but we have a dream to create AAA games in the future. We are dedicated our lives to create quality games for your satisfaction. 
We already have 2 games available for download. Please check them out.
facebook.com/xaljunaid

facebook.com/xdenzling

facebook.com/xorcas


Please visit our website:
www.xorcas.com
This campaign is raising funds on behalf of Xorcas Games

story:
New Fundraiser

Participate in our new fundraiser to help make Foxotic possible! Go to the new campaign by clicking on the link below!

http://foxotic.com/indiegogo

Short Summary

Hi, I'm Ben! I'm the founder of Foxotic, an upcoming virtual world targeted for kids! We plan on developing a virtual world for kids by summer of 2013 that is fun yet educational. All work will be done in Flash and we will be programming our own servers. 

We have servers to maintain, artwork to create, and a lot of ingame and external features to develop. Unfortunately, this project requires a lot of money and time. This is why we are asking you to step in and help make Foxotic possible!

What We Need & What You Get

We currently need a good amount of money in order to continue development on Foxotic. All donations will be used to develop and maintain Foxotic. Donors will receive special perks depending on how much you contribute.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? That doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Follow us via Twitter @Foxotic
  • Send us your ideas, fan art, and suggestions! 
  • Spread the word about Foxotic!

story:
PRE ORDER YOUR MASTER BLASTER
@ HALF PRICE TODAY.

***********************************************

PRESENTATION:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ywi_ITPMrec

****************************************************

TRUE MARKSMAN SHOOTING IN:

PLANETSIDE 1/2
MASS EFFECT 1/2/3
BATTLEFIELD 2143/2/3
CALL OF DUTY SERIES
MEDAL OF HONOR SERIES
ALL OTHER FIRST PERSON SHOOTERS

 

We will ship your BLASTER to you anywhere on the PLANET:

UNITED STATES
UNITED KINGDOM
EUROPE

SAUDI ARABIA
SINGAPORE
MALAYSIA

AFRICA
ASIA
AUSTRALIA

INDIA
DUBAI
KOREA

EVERYWHERE.

 

iNTERACTIVE 5D (TM) (2011)
LAZER BLASTER

BODY MOTION INTERACTION or IN-GUN JOYSTICK MOTION

DIRECT POINT AND SHOOT
ALL PC FPS GAMES

 

This project is about bringing to market the most awesome gaming guns yet realized.  

What makes these guns so awesome is not only how they look and feel, but how they actually inter-operate within a game.

These guns are PC compatible and are primarily designed to work with first person shooter PC games such as Battlefield 2 & 3, Call of Duty, Medal of Honor, Crysis and even games like Doom...

How the gun works is by emulating a keyboard and mouse as far as the game is concerned.  Normally, when you move a mouse around in a game, you can only shoot at the center of the screen and have to target the enemy dead center before firing.

With our gaming guns, all that is history.  You simply point the gun directly at the target and fire.  Our software and electronics reads what you are doing with the gun and automatically adjusts the mouse position and fires your shot.  If you miss, its because you actually missed the shot.  

Great marksman and reflex training at the same time!

These guns work with our 5D projection system, as well as regular wall projectors as well as 3D and 2D TV system and computer monitors.

Our 5D system (also referred to as i3D) fills the room up with the gaming world wall to wall , ceiling to floor and puts you INSIDE the environment similar to the  holodeck found in Star Trek which was one of the inspirations of the project.

Our guns have a laser targeting system for use with a 5D setup or a 2D large wall projector setup allowing you to fire precise point and shoot shots in all of these games which is otherwise impossible without our software.

For smaller TV sets and monitors, the guns operate similar to a Wii gun except that they are PC, Wii, Android and iOS (plugged into a projector) compatible but with more calibration options than any Wii gun.

We built prototypes and set up two demo locations in Atlanta.

The prototypes were built using NERF gun parts and BUZZBEE gun parts.  We attempted to license the NERF design with Hasbro - but the discussion reached no firm conclusion.  We then decided to build our own design inspired by a range of weapons found in actual games.

Our design for mass production is shown here:

Support us at $55 or above, and you will get one of these awesome blasters at a fraction of the retail price.

And the color scheme of the gun will be similar to this one (although not the design):

 

We now need to bring the product to mass market and you can be a pivotal part in that.

We need to complete the initial mold and gun parts.
We need to finalize the electronics and software.
We need to finalize packaging.
We need to get the first batch of guns (2000 or so) in stock.
We need to do a TV infomercial.
We need to launch the product. 

We anticipate about 1500 of this 2000 gun batch will go to the backers making this a phenomenal win-win deal.

IF WE RECEIVE OVER THE ASKING AMOUNT FROM PEOPLE WHO WANT GUNS,  WE'LL SIMPLY PLACE A BIGGER ORDER WITH THE MANUFACTURER!

Be part of this new gaming era and be recognized as such. 

----------------------------------------------

The guns are designed to work with computer monitors, TV sets (plasma, DLP, CRT, LCD, OLED..) and projector setups.  They are also excellent accessories for our 5D gaming and theater set up.

To recap, the guns are primarily designed for PC based games.  They will also work with the Wii.  They CAN also work with the Playstation 3 and XBOX 360 if we can get agreements with Sony and Microsoft in place.  The guns will also work with an ipad game and an android game and even the upcoming ooya gaming system and any system that uses bluetooth or can have bluetooth added.

For more information on the 5D environment that these guns best compliment, as well as the details of how the complimentary gaming screens are built you can view the following link: 

http://www.i-zone-3.com

 

PLEASE NOTE FOR GUN DELIVERIES OUTSIDE THE USA, EXTRA POSTAGE WILL APPLY DEPENDING ON REGION.

story:
What is Rats & Castles?

Rats & Castles is a  platform game set to release on Android devices and PC that really have that retro look and feel that gamers used to love. The visual style is close to the old handheld games from the early 90's and the gameplay is simple but challenging.


How will it make people's life better?

Besides being fun to play... 10% of the game profits will go to charity foundations and another 10% to open source projects.


Game Features

  • Multiple levels.
  • Powerups.
  • Bosses.
  • Purchase upgrades with credits earned in game.
  • High scores.


About the Android version

  • Free on Play Store, monetized with AdMob and no microtransactions.
  • Simple and intuitive touch controls... no virtual buttons or joysticks.
  • Online leaderbords and achievements using Google Play services.
  • Weekly updates with new content and more for free.


About the PC version

  • Runs on Windows PC's.
  • The game will cost 10 usd on itch.io
  • No DRM.
  • Xbox 360 controller support.
  • More gameplay features and bigger levels compared to the Android version.
  • Monthly updates with new content and more for free.


What about a release date?

The game is planned to release on Android devices in two months and  before the end of the year on PC.


Why launching a campaign and what do I need?

I run this campaign to be able to get a Business Licence for Contruct 2. I've choosed a flexible goal because if the 500$ goal is not reached I can go with a Personal License and move on with the game release and upgrade my license later. To get more information about Contruct 2: https://www.scirra.com


Can I try the game now?

Yes of course! Just click on this link: https://www.scirra.com/arcade/adventure-games/rats-and-castles-preview-version-965?cp=2 Please keep on mind that the game is in early development and is only playable on PC with a keyboard. This is a demo for the android version so the extra features and direct controls are missing. I recommend playing in Google Chrome for a better experience.


Will the game be released on other platforms?

I plan to make a Ubuntu compatible version of the game later but I'm focused on the Android and Windows versions of the game for now.


About the developer

I am a computer and video games enthusiastic since my early childhood. I love old Nintendo games and retro styled games. I've made some games prototypes over the last years but nothing that I've made passed that stage until now. In was thinking to start another game project and at the same time I've tried an awesome game making tool called Construct 2. It was so fun and easy to make a prototype that I've decided to go the extra mile and make a complete game. That idea became of course... Rats & Castles.


Is there others ways to help?

Yes!! You can share the project with your friends, family or on socials networks :)
story_txt:
What is Rats & Castles?
Rats & Castles is a  platform game set to release on Android devices and PC that really have that retro look and feel that gamers used to love. The visual style is close to the old handheld games from the early 90's and the gameplay is simple but challenging.


How will it make people's life better?
Besides being fun to play... 10% of the game profits will go to charity foundations and another 10% to open source projects.



Game Features


Multiple levels.
Powerups.
Bosses.
Purchase upgrades with credits earned in game.
High scores.



About the Android version


Free on Play Store, monetized with AdMob and no microtransactions.

Simple and intuitive touch controls... no virtual buttons or joysticks.

Online leaderbords and achievements using Google Play services.
Weekly updates with new content and more for free.



About the PC version




Runs on Windows PC's.
The game will cost 10 usd on itch.io

No DRM.
Xbox 360 controller support.
More gameplay features and bigger levels compared to the Android version.
Monthly updates with new content and more for free.


What about a release date?
The game is planned to release on Android devices in two months and  before the end of the year on PC.

Why launching a campaign and what do I need?
I run this campaign to be able to get a Business Licence for Contruct 2. story:
Short Summary

After many failed attempts at buying video games from just picture alone, I decided that it would be great if I had an app on my phone where I could just type in the name of the game and see instantly what other gamers thought about it. 

Sure every game deserves a chance, but i'm sure everyone is tired of spending $60 on a game just to find out that it was a big waste of money. Spending even $20 is a big deal if the game has zero playability.

What We Need & What You Get

The money will be used for

1. App development

2. Website Development

Once the app is up and running it will be FREE to all. 

We will also...

1.Have game give-aways every other month to our top app users

2.Give away 5 of the new consoles that everyone is anxiously waiting to come out

(X-Box 720?, PS4?, and Wii U?) Whenever they are released

The Impact

This app will allow gamers to...

1.Go into any game store, type in the name of any selected game that they are considering for purchase, and get a rating from other users that have played that game. 

2.Save tons of money by not buying crappy games that you end up stuck with, or having to resell it to a game store for way less then paid for. 

3.Be part of a community where forums will be held. Speak with other users about up coming games, strategies. or whatever else is on the gamers mind.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can donate money for this campaign and that's cool. We still want you to enjoy the app when it comes out. 

Get the word out to all of your friends and family that are into video games. 

Let them know about the game give-aways that we will have every other month

Sign up and be part of the community. It's all going to be FREE, FREE, AND FREE.

story:
The project

http://www.phiara.com

Three years ago I have started this project more as a learning exercise for my programming skills. I worked on it whenever I found some free time, and I enjoyed it. As time went by, the project started to grow and look more like a fully working game.

It is now almost finished, I estimate it is 75% done, however there are some things that need to be done and which I cannot do by myself, as I am only good with programming and somewhat good with design.


The goal

Phiara is designed as a free online space exploring browser game.


That means that the game can be played in any browser, on any resolution and any hardware.

It is based around an online community, and the game is focused around exploration, social interaction and sharing experiences. There are no battles to be fought or empires to build, like so many other games in this niche.

The game will always be free and available for everyone in the world.


What is needed & what you get

I need some funds to finish some parts of the game that I kept postponing for some time now because of lack of money. The game needs new graphic elements to be designed or the existing ones to be updated. For this I need a graphic designer. I have worked with a team in the past and they did a wonderful job, however it was not cheap.


The game now has it's own domain name and hosting plan for which I payed myself. However, the expiration date for these is arriving soon.


Since the game is multiplatform, it needs to be tested on a wide spectrum of available hardware.

I have already optimized it for PCs, laptops and netbooks, iPhones and iPads. However, I don't have an Android platform, and I would like to invest in a Android smartphone for further optimisation.


I plan to create an iPhone app and a Android app for the game, so it can be accessed this way too. However, to become a iPhone developer you need to pay Apple a fee.


No mater what your donation amount is, you'll be mentioned in the credits of the game with a big thank you!


Other ways you can help

Any donation amount is more then welcome, however if you want to support this project you can sign-up for the Beta testing, and provide feedback.


You can also spread the word about this project on your preferred social network.

story:
Short Summary

Monster RPG 2 is a fairly successful JRPG for PC, Mac, Linux, Android and iOS. But it can be so much more! I am seeking funding that will allow me to not only open source the game engine and all of its data, but also help developers create games using this engine by 1) Offering contributors 1 on 1 help via email, IRC and any other form of communication accessible to me, and 2) Create a massive development wiki which will have information on the codebase and data formats used to personalize a game of your own. For 3 months I will be at the mercy of my contributors, fixing bugs and adding features to make this engine general purpose and easy for coders to create their dream games with. And plus, anyone in the world will be able to download Monster RPG 2 for free!

What We Need & What You Get

To make this game free and open, I need to keep my server running, development fees paid and enough left over to continue developing new games. My server costs about $40/mo and I need $99 annually for an iOS development license. I calculate $40/mo and $99/yr to be $1160 over two years. I estimate that perks will cost me several hundred dollars, and it's inevitable that I will need some money to continue working on Baryon (which you get with $5 and up contributions) which is why I'm asking for $1500.

I'm offering some really unique perks. I'll be your personal coding machine for 2 weeks for $50, for example.

New perk: Get access to our latest game as we develop it!

I'm very happy to announce a new $5 perk in this campaign. It's a doozy. You'll get alpha access (EDIT: AT LEAST monthly builds, sometimes more often) to our "top-secret" in-development game we've code-named Baryon (plus the full version when it's ready)! It's in the "early" (not EARLY EARLY) stages and it's going to be fantastic. Estimated time of delivery is December 1st so we can polish it up for you guys some more.

The Impact

The world needs more open source games! But that doesn't mean YOUR game has to be open source. You will be free to choose whatever license you want for the Monster RPG 2 engine and assets, thanks to it being released under the Give it Your Own License, License. Like free software? Release your game under the GPL. Or perhaps you want to make a commercial game? That's ok too!

But this campaign isn't only about developers. Every single person out there will gain access to the full version of Monster RPG 2 from the App Store, direct from our site, or from one of the many other distributors the game is available from now. So by making a pledge, you're investing in free copies of the game for all of your friends and family, too.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are a large number of people that really enjoy classic style JRPGs, and there are very few good ones available freely. Get the word out to your friends about this campaign! Any pledge is super-appreciated by me. On an end note, this game was once free for a day on the iTunes App Store. It received over 10 thousand downloads that day. For $1500, the game could be downloaded tens of thousands more times for free!

This campaign really has two goals. Spread a great game to as many people as possible for free, and help developers make great games of their own by improving the engine over the course of 3 months, even adding custom features specifically designed by contributors. My love for this game means I will continue to support it (though may not have as much time) beyond 90 days. APPEND: And now there's a third goal: get some new eyes on our in-development action RPG, Baryon!

Please note: I will provide all the support I can for developers, but I recommend a good knowledge of C++ and programming in general if you wish to take advantage of the developer perks! Please also note that this game uses version 5.1 of the Allegro game programming library.

Stretch Goals

My goal with this fundraiser is to make enough money to tide me over until my team's next project (Baryon) is finished. Therefore, anything above the $1,500 goal will go to charity (PAOS - the same charity as the CD sales goes to.) If the campaign reaches over $1,600, I'll post a personal thank you video, because this charity is very special to me! I'm not very good in front of cameras, so this is a BIG DEAL for me! :)

story:
PLEASE Help us make our New Goals!!

 

All the funds raised by this project will go to supporting the cost of the Expo and HoneyQuest production only!

Send HoneyQuest to the Vancouver Gaming Expo!

Hi, my name is Adam, Creator and Designer of HoneyQuest. I have always loved creative projects and ideas and this board game I've created is no exception. I am an undergraduate student currently on a hiatus while my family grows :) I am pursuing a degree in Media Communications with a focus on Game desgin and Story development.

HoneyQuest is a great family board game that gets the player to take the role of a monarch Bee and make decisions like:

  • When to send you workers out to retrieve nectar
  • When to produce honeycombs
  • What improvements you want to add to your Hive

You also play as different species of Bee's that have different attributes.

To win the game: Be the first player to store up 30 honeycombs while avoiding disasters an sneaky predators!

 

HoneyQuest has been given an amazing opportunity. In November we will be going to the Vancouver Gaming Expo! Now unless we are properly funded, our effectiveness at the Expo will be very small. While still good we are truly hoping to expand our network and share HoneyQuest with a printed sellable copy at the Expo.

Please help us reach this goal.

 

Perks

 

Update on II Prototype

Here are some drafts of the II prototype cards and what form and style they will have. The cards will be printed through The Game Crafter and eventually be available through their online store.

Your Pledges

Your pledges will launch HoneyQuest to the next stage of development. Allowing for more work to be done fine-tuning and polishing the great game it already is, while also breaking the way for new expansions that are waiting in the wings!

Every dollar from this campaign will be used and cherished. Thank you so much for your support in reading and watching this, but also any other way you can contribute to our goal. Thank you.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute to our goal we definetly understand and want to encourage you to spread the word about our little game and this campaign!

And at our Website: 

 

Use Facebook, Twitter, Myspace, Youtube, Tell your neighbor, anyway you can think of, also use the IndieGoGo share tools.

And Thanks again!

story:
Do you love sport? Were you transfixed by the Olympics and Paralympics in 2012 like me? Want to get involved in Rio 2016 and be part of a team? Want to be able to tell your friends and family about how YOU are part of International Sport and possibly even the 2016 Paralympics? Then read on...

Hi. My name is Mat Campbell-Hill and I am a wheelchair athlete for Great Britain. In 2009 a spinal injury left me bed ridden and meant that I was forced to stop work and my sporty lifestyle. I was told I would never get back to any normal life and to 'mourn the life I lost', but I don't give up easily and over the following two years I was able to improve my muscle tone around the affected areas so that I could walk short distances with a stick. This physiotherapy eventually led me to the Paralympic version of my previous sport and, in 2011, I started Wheelchair Fencing.

Unfortunately, I did not have time to prepare and qualify for London 2012 but I am now well on my way internationally with top ten finishes and two Bronze Medals at World Cup level. My success is in no small part due to my commitment to a full time training programme and the support of one of the best fencing clubs in the Europe - Truro Fencing Club.

At Truro, not only do I get to train alongside current GB and international Olympic Athletes, but I also have the support of previous Olympic and Paralympic coaches and the wider support staff ensuring my programme is professional and of the highest standard.

Sadly, in January of this year UKSport decided to withdraw funding for Wheelchair Fencing. Without external funding I have zero chance of fulfilling my potential to keep winning medals and improving, or of qualifying for Rio! We have exhausted all of our personal funds to get me to this point and now I need external support to help me get there. This is where you come in.

By buying one of these perks, not only will you be getting involved in international sport, AND getting yourself some fantastic limited edition stash, but you will be helping me continue my qualification to Rio and potentially of getting my medal in 2016. Imagine: sitting watching the medal ceremonies with your friends and family and being able to say - "I made that happen! I'm part of that team!"

For Silver Friend and above, if you are a youth-focused or disability organisation, for example a school or youth club, and would wish to receive more regular updates, for example to help with a term or year-long project, please contact me when purchasing the perk. Depending on the level of support, your class/group will then receive regular updates and quizzes. Ultimately, this can be supplemented by a visit and talk (for perks of Bronze Supporter and above).

Also, businesses take note: each World Cup carries press coverage before and after and I am always happy to include my valuable sponsorship partners in any coverage.

Please feel free to buy multiple perks and do contact me if you wish to discuss larger amounts or more comprehensive sponsorship for custom perks such as:

- Medal Winning Weapons

- Replica Kit with your logo on

- Your logo on my kit at competitions

- London 2012 official GB Olympic Medal Presentation Kit

- Bespoke personal training sessions with me

Check out my website here for updates, pictures and video: www.matcampbellhill.com 

For a breakdown of costs click here: http://www.matcampbellhill.com/#!athlete-costs/c1i7s

Also find me on twitter here: https://twitter.com/ParalympicBlade


DISCLAIMER: Wheelchair Fencing at international level is an open skill sport and therefore highly competitive. Sponsorship does not guarantee medals nor does it guarantee qualification for the Paralympics. Larger levels of sponsorship will be subject to a contractual agreement with my internationally renowned coaching staff who will also ensure my commitment and transparency of the agreement to the mutual satisfaction of all parties concerned where possible.

satisfaction of all parties concerned where possible.

story:
Short Summary

A game that makes typing fun, Rally Typer combines the traditional and widely beloved race kart genre with a typing speed competition. The way it works is simple: you type out a pre-set text on your keyboard, aiming for perfect accuracy and exceptional speed. The faster and more accurate that you are, the better that you will do in the race. This is a browser-based game, so you don't need any peripheral hardware to play it. The graphics are cartoony and 3D, and the gameplay itself is extremely exciting, turning the simple act of typing into something frenetic and competitive.

When you type well in Rally Typer, you earn a turbo boost, and the "keyboard" boxes contain other weapons and boosts that will come in handy during gameplay. You can connect with your friends for social play, collect in-game currency for new karts and other upgrades, and display your kart collection in your virtual garage. Everything about Rally Typer emphasizes fast typing and frantic racing, and to make this game a reality, we are turning to you.


Check out the demo at http://www.rallytyper.com

This is just a demo, with your help we want to make the game play even better!

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal through this campaign is to raise $7,000, which will help cover the costs of completing development on Rally Typer and then publishing the game and marketing it to a wide audience. Your contributions will make it possible for us to make typing more fun than ever before. We appreciate all your support, and we thank you for your time.

Perks!

$5
All contributions help! At this level, I will keep you updated on my progress publishing Rally Typer.

$25

Play the game first! At this level, you will receive access to Rally Typer on the day it goes live.

$30

At this level, you'll get access to Rally Typer on the day it goes live, one submission for a kart or skin, and a vote on the final kart or skin selections.

$50

Play it before it's live! At this level, you will receive beta access to Rally Typer, one submission for a kart or skin, and a vote on the final kart or skin selections.

$75

Wake up and type! At this level, you will receive a Rally Typer-branded coffee mug, beta access to Rally Typer, one submission for a kart or skin, and a vote on the final kart or skin selections.

$100

At this level, you will receive one submission for a track, and a vote on the final track selections.  You also receive a Rally Typer-branded coffee mug, beta access to Rally Typer, one submission for a kart or skin, and a vote on the final kart or skin selections.

$150

Stay fast, stay stylish! At this level, you will receive a Rally Typer-branded t-shirt, as well as everything listed within the previous level!

 

The Impact

Rally Typer has three goals:

Short-Term
-Make typing fun for millions of people by creating this awesome typing game! 

Medium-Term
-Contribute a portion of proceeds generated by the game to a charity which places computers in low income schools. 

Long-Term
-Create an app to go along with the game. 
-Teach people of all ages how to correctly touch type via a series of interactive lessons and replace outdated software within schools. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute, that does not mean you cannot help:

  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word about this awesome game or share via your favorite social media platforms!

story:
Mobsters United is going strong on AcidBay.com
Come Play!


Please make sure to read the FAQ toward the bottom of the description.

Just so it's clear, the game WILL be done and you WILL receive your perks whether or not the goal is reached.

The game will be hosted on AcidBay.com a social network that is being specifically designed for the mob community. Feel free to swing by and check us out, it's 100% FREE! 

Ranked as the most popular social gaming app of all time, Mobsters on Myspace was loved by many. As you may know, some time ago Myspace made the decision to end support of their apps platform and deleted all the games virtually overnight. Since then we've seen a few copycats try to recreate the game, but no one has yet to actually duplicate the game. We intend to change that. 

The site owners responsible for the biggest innovations the mob community saw, including add trains, premade accounts and spreadsheets have banded together and have started rebuilding the original game. We're off to a good start and are not out to just put out another wannabe app. Our goal is to produce a new game that is as close to the original as possible. It is being based off of a system we started working on prior to the game being shut down that would have allowed the app to be moved off of Myspace before they pulled the plug. Unfortunately we ran out of time when Myspace swept the rug out from under the community, but our goal remains the same: to re-launch Mobsters and give it a fresh start.

Our goal with this campaign is to raise the funds necessary to hire additional developers and speed up production. If we meet our goal, the new game could be live in as little as 3 months. Please help us reach that goal and contribute today. Together, we CAN rebuild the game we all loved! If you can't afford to contribute, please take a moment to share our campaign on Facebook and Twitter; help us get the word out and make this campaign a success! Thank you!

While we're fully capable of completing the game on our own, things would go much faster if we had a couple other developers working with us. The more money we have backing this project, the better the team we can hire and the faster the game will be ready for the public to play. We're offering several perks in exchange for contributing and your feedback is always welcomed. 

All contribution levels receive priority access to the BETA game to help us test, provide feedback and make sure the game is bug-free when it goes live. You will have the opportunity to get in at the ground floor and help shape the new game. All Contributers will be listed on a special "Founders List" in the game credits unless otherwise requested.

Who is behind this project?

Mike Solstice, the founder of Fedora Prime has been part of the mob community since June of 2008. He opened Party Hearty, the first Add Train, shortly there after and has spearheaded many innovations in the mob community including uMobz, the first account sales site and Warlists, the first automated spreadsheet generator. With more than 10 years experience as a web developer he bring a strong background built on a solid reputation of being a name you can trust. 

Can perks apply to multiple accounts?

Absolutely. Starting out players will be allowed to have up to 5 accounts and similar to how the "BETA" accounts were setup on Myspace your Favor Points and Achievements will apply "across the board". How you spend them is up to you.

I don't like these perks, can I have...

Feel free to contact us with your ideas for perks, we're all ears and will consider any reasonable request.

What happens if the goal is not met? 

We'll do the best we can, every dollar helps. Regardless of the outcome of this campaign development on the new game will continue but being able to hire on additional developers would greatly speed up production time and the over-all quality of the final product. 

What about copyrights?

We have already spoken with copyright attorneys and have been advised that as long as the game is sufficiently modified there is no cause for concern there. The last thing we want is to put our time and your money into something just to have it shut down. The final game will be reviewed by our attorneys prior to being launched to insure no copyright infringement has occurred.

How do I get my perk? 

When the game is ready to go to BETA testing we will contact you to get the necessary information to setup your account. In the mean time, you can start working on your profile on our social network AcidBay.com.


I have a question not listed here.

Please feel free to contact Mike Solstice with any questions, comments or concerns you may have. 

Facebook: Mike Solstice 
Email: support@acidbay.com

If you can't afford to contribute, you can still help! Please share our campaign via Facebook, Twitter and other social media. The more we are able to spread the word, the greater chance we have of reaching our goal and getting the game wrapped up and ready to go.

story:
******* This fundraiser is primarily for continental UNITED STATES, Interested International's please read below about how the availability will work for you during this fundraiser.  **********

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tell Your Friends to check out our Website at :

WWW.XHAOSTHEORY.COM

We are also on Facebook at :

www.facebook.com/xhaostheory

We are also on Boardgame geek at :

Boardgame Geek - Click here

-----------------------------------------------

What is War Elephant Racing?

War Elephant Racing is put together by a Father and Son team for your enjoyment. War Elephant Racing first started out as a way for Dad to show his son how to take his artful ideas and turn them into something physical. Why stop at a sketch or a single concept when you can explore ideas and turn them into something even more? The team built a small little world to play in. The two have been working on other games behind the scenes of fun and craziness but wanted to present War Elephant Racing to the public first with more games to follow.

You can read more about use here at our website. Click Here.

What do you get when you mix Chaos, Cribbage, and Carnage and more fun than a sack of nuts?

War Elephant Racing!

  • Players : 2-4
  • Ages : 12+
  • Time to Play : 20 - 60 Minutes (for 4 player)
  • Type of Game: Card and Board game
  • Crowd for Game: Everyone !

Family Fun game for the kids to play and helps teach them math, reading, communication and pattern recognizing skills. The young ones pick up real quick and have a great time racing around with their War Elephant.

Beer & Pretzels: Very fun and competitive for Adults, we have played many late nights. always having good laughs and good times.  The close races and the Xhaos cards are fun for "messing with your buddies" while consuming cocktails. Never a dull moment.

War Elephant Racing (W.E.R.) is a fast paced game of chance and skill. War elephants will be bumping and crashing into each other on a tight course sending the others into a spin that will cost them crucial game points. Players must carefully balance a number of objectives, be quick with reactions, and recognize all of the scoring combinations to be able to beat their opponent. It is a game where experience counts for a great deal although a little bit of luck always helps. New and young players will be able to jump in fairly quickly and give the vets a run for their money.

War Elephant Racing uses Xhaos cards to spice up the race and increase the competitive action. Xhaos cards are special cards that call upon a special ability of an elephant of renown to give the players huge advantages to use against their competition. Special timing will provide the players with an edge over the other war elephant racers.

The funds that are raised through this program will allow us to purchase more art supplies and programs for our future projects. If this takes off to crazy levels we will be able to purchase bulk quantities of the game for us to attempt to possibly get War Elephant Racing into stores.

What We Need & What You Get

We only need $500 raised for War Elephant Racing. The game is 95% completed already and the game manufacturer is just waiting for us to put in our order. 

What we are hoping for is that you will not only support this funding but “share” this project with your friends and family and spread the word.

To share you can go to our Facebook page by clicking here.

Give $1.00 Our Sincerest Thanks

Every little bit helps, We are using your generosity for all future products and supplies.

Give $3.00 International Pre-order

International Pre-order only!  If you are interested in purchasing War Elephant Racing, you can contribute at the $3.00 International perk. When the campaign is over, we will email you a link to purchase War Elephant racing for $46.00 (-$3.00 you put down) on the perk and the software in the shopping cart will address the proper shipping rates for you and get it sent out to you in a timely manner. This special email will only be open for 30 days once the email has been sent to you and then the price will go back up. We aplogoize for any inconvenience to those that have to go this route, but this will help us insure you get charged the correct amount, as well as speed up the ordering and delivery process for everyone in the fundraiser.

Give $10.00  Spectator

You just want to watch? We will be putting your name on an insert or on the back of the game board as a War Elephant Spectator. The nice thing about this is you are in a safe spot away from the elephants so you will not have to fear being run over. The Spectators “in” the box are not so lucky.

Give $49 War Elephant Racer

Glad to see you joining in! You will get the Spectator level, plus a copy of the War Elephant Racing game! Please add +$5.00 shipping.

What all is in the War Elephant Racing game?

  • 1 Colorful and sturdy box to hold all the contents
  • 4 Colored d6 lap dice
  • 4 Colored and nicely detailed War Elephant tokens
  • 2 Blank d6 dice (1 red, 1 black)
  • 2 Sticker sheets (for blank dice)
  • 1 Full color War Elephant Bump reference card
  • 53 War Elephant playing cards, thick card stock for a long life of shuffling.
  • 32 Xhaos cards, also thick stock for a long life.
  • 1 Game Board thick and ready for the punishment of your racing elephants.
  • 2 “ Spectator” tokens, durable plastic ready for to be ran over
  • 1 12 page full color Rule book, that also includes tips and tricks to play.

All of the components in War Elephant Racing are top quality and waiting to be accepted into a loving home such as yours. When War Elephant racing arrives to your home you will want to gather your family members around to enjoy that new game smell.

Give $95 Double Trouble

Get two copies of War Elephant Racing for you and someone you care deeply for, but maybe in a friend sort of way. Two copies is better than one, and you are guaranteed to win some points for that person you are buying an extra copy for. Please add +$5.00 shipping. You will also get Spectator level.

Give $145 Owner "Only 4 Available"

You get to name one of the four elephants included in the game. Color of your elephant will be determined randomly. The name of the elephants will go on the back of the box. You will also get the Racer and Spectator levels. Name chosen cannot be vulgar, obscene, racist, or otherwise considered tasteless at our discretion. We have a sense of humor though so names like “booger” are perfectly acceptable. Use this power wisely. Please add +$5.00 shipping.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are not able to contribute, WE STILL NEED YOUR HELP. Tell your friends, use some of the tools below to post this to your Facebook page, or tweet about it. Word of mouth is huge for us. We would also not object to you getting a War Elephant Racing Tattoo, but that might be a little soon at this point.

Tell Your Friends to check out our Website at :

WWW.XHAOSTHEORY.COM

We are also on Facebook at :

www.facebook.com/xhaostheory

We are also on Boardgame geek at :

Boardgame Geek - Click here

Questions or Comments? You can email us at xhaostheory13@gmail.com

Stretch Goal

If we reach $1,250 we will add a colorful insert into the box for easier card and accessory storage. This will also improve the durability of the box itself. Not really exciting, but it will improve the quality tremendously of your game. 


*Disclaimer: As always with projects of this nature their may be delays in shipping, or in production. We have full intentions to get this out to everyone as soon as possible. We may have unforeseen hang ups due to part availability and may even have to sub a part out such as a different colored dice or what have you.from what is pictured. In these cases we will be sure to be completely up front with you, and a refund is always an option if we are unable to provide what you see above.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Martijn Straatman. I'm a Creative Designer for websites, web ui's etc. Almost 5 years ago my son was born... with Cystic Fibrosis. A not cureable decise and sometimes deadly.

To help raise funds i designed a game that helps patients excersise their lung function and is fun to play for non-patients. The story is simple but the gameplay will help them: they have to blow to make bubbles and fight dragons and bees. The hader the blow, the bubble has more effect on obstacles. Blowing is hard for CF patients. For non-patienst it is just fun to blow bubbles and play the game. Also i want to bring CF under the attention so we build in a donate button. The money we raise out of donation we give to the NCFS. This money benefits research for new medicine and how to tried the decise.

People with CF are expecting to life for 30 years... that means i proberly have to bury my own son. We want to raise as much money to give the children and patients a longer life. That's why we need funding. To setup the game and the in-app store to sell merchandise.

What We Need & What You Get

We need 15000 euros to set up the game and the store. Inside the store we want to sell merchandise like puppets. The funding goes directly to NCFS, they will take care of our account. People who fund us 1000 euros or more will get their name or logo inside the game as a Bubble Wizard!

The Impact

Every euro we donate to the NCFS has an effect on a patienst life! This decise has an effect, not only on a patient but on a family as well. We have to tread it! This project has a large social effect as well.Let's do this together and play for air!

Other Ways You Can Help

You can always contribute to NCFS or help us in another way.

Contact us if you want to help at: martijn.straatman@mm-creatives.com

Watch more screens

Flickr: http://www.flickr.com/photos/bubblewizard
story_txt:
Short Summary
My name is Martijn Straatman. I'm a Creative Designer for websites, web ui's etc. Almost 5 years ago my son was born... with Cystic Fibrosis. A not cureable decise and sometimes deadly.
To help raise funds i designed a game that helps patients excersise their lung function and is fun to play for non-patients. The story is simple but the gameplay will help them: they have to blow to make bubbles and fight dragons and bees. The hader the blow, the bubble has more effect on obstacles. Blowing is hard for CF patients. For non-patienst it is just fun to blow bubbles and play the game. Also i want to bring CF under the attention so we build in a donate button. The money we raise out of donation we give to the NCFS. This money benefits research for new medicine and how to tried the decise.
People with CF are expecting to life for 30 years... that means i proberly have to bury my own son. We want to raise as much money to give the children and patients a longer life. That's why we need funding. To setup the game and the in-app store to sell merchandise.


What We Need & What You Get
We need 15000 euros to set up the game and the store. Inside the store we want to sell merchandise like puppets. The funding goes directly to NCFS, they will take care of our account. People who fund us 1000 euros or more will get their name or logo inside the game as a Bubble Wizard!
The Impact


Every euro we donate to the NCFS has an effect on a patienst life! This decise has an effect, not only on a patient but on a family as well. We have to tread it! This project has a large social effect as well.Let's do this together and play for air!

story:
Introduction:

A couple years ago, I began a journey. It started at my dining-room table with some good friends, a bag of polyhedral dice, and a bottle of Mountain Dew. I created a fantasy adventure campaign that centered around a mysterious swamp dotted with barrow mounds and standing stones. A vast dungeon existed beneath the mounds. It teemed with undead and burial crypts filled with precious treasures. We had a lot of fun and I wondered if other people might be interested in Barrowmaze.

Not really knowing much about PDF publishing, I brought my home-game notes together and that became the basis of Barrowmaze I (published under the Open Gaming License and compatible with Labyrinth Lord and other classic fantasy role-playing games). However, there was still another half of the map yet to stock, so I ran a successful campaign for Barrowmaze II on Indiegogo that included former TSR artist Jim Holloway and brought another artist, the awesome Trevor Hammond, out of retirement. Because I love old school RPG art and gamer swag, I ran another successful campaign on Indiegogo to create some fun Barrowmaze Tees with the tag line "Get Rich or Die Tryin" which pretty much sums up the experience of the dungeon :)

Through the support of the old school gaming community, Barrrowmaze I was listed in the Top 10 on RPGnow for months and finished in Second Place for the prestigious Three Castles Game Award for RPG Design at the North Texas RPGcon last June. 

Although Barrowmaze has my name on the cover, I view the adventure as a communal expression -- it speaks to the type of game we want to play, the style of game we want to forward, and that the roots of our hobby are important and worth preserving for future gamers.

The Plan: Barrowmaze Complete

Barrowmaze I and II need to be combined into one definitive volume: Barrowmaze Complete. This new book will include all the material from the two previous books plus the new material outlined below under New Material.

New to Barrowmaze?

If you are completely new to Barrowmaze it includes:

-Over 200 pages of material (combined).

-Over 600+ dungeon rooms.

-A vast field of 60 barrow mounds above the dungeon.

-A dedicated monster section each with individual illustrations.

-Sections for new magic items and spells.

-A custom character sheet.

-A random crypt generator and more.

-Literally years of gaming.

New Material

In addition to combining the two books, this campaign will facilitate the introduction of 1) New Content, 2) New Art, 3) New Professional Layout and Cover Design.

1. New Content:

The village of Helix, the starting point for the campaign, will be detailed in full to provide a threshold to the adventure. The focus will be on NPCs to create role-playing opportunities to balance the emphasis on dungeon crawling. Locations like The Brazen Strumpet Tavern (with a random patron generator), as well as the Shrine of St. Ygg (and many others), will be laid out. Numerous sub-plots will be added for the PCs to pursue both in town and to piece together information gleaned from Barrowmaze. The town will include a map of the various locations. My goal is to bring Helix to life through interesting NPCs (all with illustrations) and create a vibrant and intriguing gaming environment.

Additional Barrow Mounds (especially mid-level) will be added, as well as dungeon rooms, map additions, rumours, rival adventuring parties, monsters, magic items, and spells. There will also be further revisions to the plot line surrounding the Pit of Chaos and role-playing opportunities in the dungeon. 

Although I can encapsulate everything into a concise paragraph or two, the above constitutes a substantive amount of work.

2. New Art:

I am thrilled to announce that Erol Otus will illustrate the colour cover and the frontispiece of Barrowmaze Complete. I must admit, I am very excited about Erol's involvement. He is my favourite TSR artist and think his otherworldly oeuvre fits Barrowmaze perfectly. I had the opportunity to meet Erol at the NTRPGcon last June and he was keen to take part in this project.

I am also very excited to announce that Timothy Truman, another Ex-TSR artist from the early days of the hobby, will provide new interior illustrations including a full page illustration of Barrowmaze II baddie Lord Varghoulis! This is an exciting development for the OSR, as I have yet to see Tim's work return in the context of the old school movement.

In addition, Cory Hamel, Stefan Poag, Zhu Bajie, and others will all return to provide new illustrations. 

As you may already know, I am absolutely committed to providing the best classic fantasy art possible for this project. Barrowmaze will celebrate the art of classic fantasy role-playing games.

3. New Professional Layout and Cover Design:

Cory Hamel, the Barrowmaze II cartographer and artist, is a professional graphic designer for a firm in Vancouver. Cory will facilitate the layout and create the new cover design. The new layout will include header illustrations and commentary by me in the outside margins to help facilitate play for referees.

What are the Official Barrowmaze Miniatures by Otherworld?

Alongside the Barrowmaze Complete book, this project includes the creation of a new Boxed Set of Barrowmaze monsters developed in concert with Richard Scott of Otherworld Miniatures (Richard has also run a successful campaign on Indiegogo).The Barrowmaze boxed set will be modeled after the sets of Dungeon Adventurers currently available on the Otherworld Website and include art by Victor Corbella.

This set will include 16 (28mm) pewter miniatures. These miniatures will include both conversions of Otherworld figures by Dave Soderquist and new sculpts by Andrew May. 

The work on these new miniatures began in late November. We are well underway already! The 16 miniatures include:

2 Tomb Robbers

2 Sapphire Skeletons

2 Fossil Skeletons

2 Juju Zombies

2 Sons of Gaxx

1 Ravenous Zombie

1 Crypt Thing

1 Crypt Knight

1 Mummy Lord

1 Barrow Harpy

1 Barrow Guardian (Statue pose with plinth. Shield for conversion to Greater Barrow Guardian. Sculpted by Andrew May)

Miniature Stretch Goals:

For each $5,000 in funding an additional miniature will be added to Levels 4 and above!

5k: Barrow Guardian (Attacking pose. Shield for conversion to Greater Barrow Guardian) [CHECK!]

10k: Coffer Corpses (2) [CHECK!]

15k: Barrow Wight "Rendar Serouc" [CHECK!]

20k: Caryatid Column (at least 1, possibly 2)

25k: Margoyle "Zygstral"

30k: Barrow Harpy "Vultrix"

35k: Death Knight "Lord Varghoulis"

40k: Necrolyte of Nergal

45k: Multi-Part Mongrelmen (at least 2, possibly 3)

50k: ?

I would also like to hear from you in the comments! What do you think would make an awesome miniature for Barrowmaze?

Shipping:

Shipping for this campaign will take place in two phases: the books and the miniatures. The books will be mailed directly from Lightning Source for the US, Canada, and the UK. This should cut down on international shipping charges (I'm based in Canada). I will post all miniatures for the United States and Canada, and Richard Scott will post all UK orders. This will mean faster delivery for everyone.

If you live in the EU just add $10 to your total pledge.

If you live in New Zealand or Australia contact me with your shipping information and I will get back to you.

Bonus for Barrowmaze II Backers:

I think it is important to support the people who helped make the Barrowmaze II campaign a success. This project simply wouldn't be at this point without you. So, if you contributed to the Barrowmaze II campaign (at any level), and you pledge to the Barrowmaze Complete campaign at Level 4 -- I will throw in 2 free miniatures. This is just a small gesture on my part to acknowledge you and your continued support of Barrowmaze. I do appreciate it.

(When) The End is Near!: Add-Ons

After the campaign comes to a close, select miniatures will be available to backers at Level 3 and above as individual add-ons. I realize there are third parties out there that manage this sort of thing, but I'd much rather keep it simple and facilitate this myself. I personally packaged and shipped over 100 boxes for the Barrowmaze II campaign - not one went missing and all were packed correctly. I will make more detail available later in the campaign.

Challenges:

As noted above, I have completed two successful Barrowmaze campaigns on Indiegogo. I listed the end of December of 2014 as the target date for completion of this project. However, a project like this one includes numerous people and a number of moving parts that add to its complexity and could possibly push the project into early January. Given the good start on the campaign already, I'm confident in the timely completion of Barrowmaze Complete but need to acknowledge the obvious challenges.

About the Author:

I am a Professor of Popular Culture at Brock University in Ontario, Canada. I teach courses on both digital and tabletop role-playing games in both historical and contemporary perspective. I have published in leading academic journals as well as a research monograph with the University of British Columbia Press. Role-playing games have taught me a great deal, I want to create and give back.

If you need to contact me please use this email address:

barrowmazecomplete AT gmail DOT com

Barrowmaze Complete Teaser Trailer by Ari Binus:

Ari Binus is a professional children's book illustrator, animator/director, and digital artist based in the Boston area. His interest in art came from the iconic red and blue boxed sets. Ari has long been interested in old school role-playing and, for almost as long, has been recovering from a certain fantasy adventure cartoon being inexplicably yanked off the air. He finds making art to be his best medicine. You can find Ari at www.aribinus.com

story:
Well after my busy Easter answering some amazing txt stumbled on http://t.co/2XisCDx2K4 looks like it shaping up to be a great horror game

— peter molyneux (@pmolyneux) 22 Avril 2014


 

 

 

An old House from 30s, dusty windows and closed shutters, everything is covered with cobwebs. Brambles and vegetation surrounding the moldy walls what seems that is was a beautiful house. You hear deep and strange noises coming from it.. and you think that it is sound of the wind knocking in the abandoned house! Or maybe your head playing tricks on you.. Nothing indicates that the place is dangerous. You remember the legends that surround this house, disappearances and terrible stories.. You try to convince yourself that these are just legends. Pushed by curiosity, you are about to enter because you’re a brave person who’s not afraid of these children’s stories. You move slowly towards the house.. Noise stop, the door got opened.. Heartbeats got faster till it can be heard.. This is the beating of your heart which doesn’t stop thinking about what you’re expecting once you get inside, there is no turning back.. Only cowards whom are afraid of such place.. Then, you take your courage in hand and you go to the door of the entrance…

 

 

 

 

The conjuring House is a Paranormal Horror Experience with an “oppressive ambiance. The game takes place in an abandoned house and yet not .. Unoccupied, where players will encounter all kinds of evil paranormal activity, and confront the devil that haunts the house. 

Scary, creepy, worrying are the words that define the game,fear and foreboding are the pillars on which "The Conjuring House" is based. The game's goal is to maintain immersion, and explore the concept of fear within the player’s engagement with the game. inspired by the big hits of the cinema to provide the most terrifying paranormal experience.

Gameplay, lighting, sound effects and paranormal effects have been designed to offer complete immersion and the feeling of being constantly in danger, everything with high-definition graphics.

 

The Conjuring House is more than a game, it's an experience to live...

Features:

-  A True Survival Horror Experience: You are not a hero, if you want to survive, your only chance is to run... and hide 

-  Immersive Graphics and special effects : Height-quality graphics that puts you directly in the atmosphere of abandoned houses.

-  Unpredictable Enemies: Players cannot know when or where the evil will appear, and cannot anticipate the events that will breed 

 

GENERAL INFO 

Release Date : 2017

Developer : Rym Games

Genre : Survival-Horror

Platform : PC Downloadable

 

Other Platforms: TBD

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Source of inspiration

 

 

Another haunted house! you will say, Slamming doors, odd noises, dark places, furniture that moves alone, footsteps sounds, shadows that might be seen and all the stereotypes that can describe a real haunted house, however, we must admit it, it is still and will always be a great classical ancestral fears. A classic that always take place in cinema, literature and not that far at folk tales. 

When we were young, we used to test our courage by entering abandoned houses, overcoming our fears and proving our courage, influenced by movies and legends. we were exploring the houses imagining various stories and scripts. Remembering these children's adventures stories, we thought that it will be great to recreate this game in a virtual space, a new video game with the same fear feeling, skin chill and hands shiver, a real simulation that puts you with no thinking and obviously in the old-school horror ambience to live a real paranormal experience, thus that was our first goal from designing this game. 

So get ready cause haunted houses have become rare nowadays.

 

 

Creative vision

Monsters, a cinematic shot and a dose of violence is not enough to make a horror game, Fear is primarily a feeling and a psychological state. A better horror experience happens through immersion. Our goal is to put the player inside the game, and give the player a feeling of living an experience, rather than playing a game.

The goal is to maintain immersion, and explore the concept of fear within the player’s engagement with the game.

Designing for fear is also about leveraging the power of suggestion, which if done properly triggers a fear of the unknown, and can put the player in a state of panic. It’s the same concept used by Lovecraft, or any good creator of horror, who realizes the most crippling dread comes from a person’s own imagination.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We chose IndieGoGo because it's a very open funding platform, and we hope to raise enough money to make a high quality game.

 

We've decided to use IndieGoGo because we feel we can innovate by remaining independent and free from the creative boundaries of a publisher. This is what makes developing games so special to us, it's fun, it's innovative, we get to share with you, and we feel the need to create. By contributing to our campaign you will empower that idea and make this happen.

We're now at the point in development where we have finished the core gameplay, but there is still a lot of production, as well as a ton of polishing and testing left to do. We want to take our time and make the game as good as possible.

We need your funding to help us keep our staff on full-time and hire additional staff to speed up production of the game without lowering our expectations to the quality of the finished game, or delay the release. We hope this Indiegogo will help us deliver the best possible experience that we can.

 

 

RYM Games is an independent game studio based in Morocco founded by former developers from Ubisoft, We’ve worked on multiple titles such Prince of Persia and Rayman. The Conjuring House is the studio’s first title, a  paranormale horror experience which aims to bring back the old-school horror feeling. Our mission is to create interactive experiences in which the player goes on an unforgettable journey.

 

 

 

 

 

The Conjuring House in the media:

 

- Gamasutra 

 

 

Fear and foreboding are design pillars in The Conjuring House

 

Designing for fear is also about leveraging the power of suggestion, which if done properly triggers a fear of the unknown, and can put the player in a state of panic, says Kharijah. It’s the same concept used by Lovecraft, or any good creator of horror, who realizes the most crippling dread comes from a person’s own imagination. “Imagination stays very important in creating successful and original situations of fear,” Kharijah says.

http://www.gamasutra.com/view/news/215699/Fear_and_foreboding_are_design_pillars_in_The_Conjuring_House.php

 

- Gameblog:
