story_txt:
Well after my busy Easter answering some amazing txt stumbled on http://t.co/2XisCDx2K4 looks like it shaping up to be a great horror game— peter molyneux (@pmolyneux) 22 Avril 2014
   An old House from 30s, dusty windows and closed shutters, everything is covered with cobwebs. Brambles and vegetation surrounding the moldy walls what seems that is was a beautiful house. You hear deep and strange noises coming from it.. and you think that it is sound of the wind knocking in the abandoned house! Or maybe your head playing tricks on you.. Nothing indicates that the place is dangerous. You remember the legends that surround this house, disappearances and terrible stories.. You try to convince yourself that these are just legends. Pushed by curiosity, you are about to enter because you’re a brave person who’s not afraid of these children’s stories. You move slowly towards the house.. Noise stop, the door got opened.. Heartbeats got faster till it can be heard.. This is the beating of your heart which doesn’t stop thinking about what you’re expecting once you get inside, there is no turning back.. Only cowards whom are afraid of such place.. Then, you take your courage in hand and you go to the door of the entrance…    The conjuring House is a Paranormal Horror Experience with an “oppressive ambiance. The game takes place in an abandoned house and yet not .. Unoccupied, where players will encounter all kinds of evil paranormal activity, and confront the devil that haunts the house. Scary, creepy, worrying are the words that define the game,fear and foreboding are the pillars on which "The Conjuring House" is based. The game's goal is to maintain immersion, and explore the concept of fear within the player’s engagement with the game. inspired by the big hits of the cinema to provide the most terrifying paranormal experience.Gameplay, lighting, sound effects and paranormal effects have been designed to offer complete immersion and the feeling of being constantly in danger, everything with high-definition graphics. The Conjuring House is more than a game, it's an experience to live...Features:-  A True Survival Horror Experience: You are not a hero, if you want to survive, your only chance is to run... and hide -  Immersive Graphics and special effects : Height-quality graphics that puts you directly in the atmosphere of abandoned houses.-  Unpredictable Enemies: Players cannot know when or where the evil will appear, and cannot anticipate the events that will breed  GENERAL INFO Release Date : 2017Developer : Rym GamesGenre : Survival-HorrorPlatform : PC Downloadable Other Platforms: TBD        Source of inspiration  Another haunted house! you will say, Slamming doors, odd noises, dark places, furniture that moves alone, footsteps sounds, shadows that might be seen and all the stereotypes that can describe a real haunted house, however, we must admit it, it is still and will always be a great classical ancestral fears. A classic that always take place in cinema, literature and not that far at folk tales. When we were young, we used to test our courage by entering abandoned houses, overcoming our fears and proving our courage, influenced by movies and legends. we were exploring the houses imagining various stories and scripts. Remembering these children's adventures stories, we thought that it will be great to recreate this game in a virtual space, a new video game with the same fear feeling, skin chill and hands shiver, a real simulation that puts you with no thinking and obviously in the old-school horror ambience to live a real paranormal experience, thus that was our first goal from designing this game. So get ready cause haunted houses have become rare nowadays.  Creative visionMonsters, a cinematic shot and a dose of violence is not enough to make a horror game, Fear is primarily a feeling and a psychological state. A better horror experience happens through immersion. Our goal is to put the player inside the game, and give the player a feeling of living an experience, rather than playing a game.The goal is to maintain immersion, and explore the concept of fear within the player’s engagement with the game.Designing for fear is also about leveraging the power of suggestion, which if done properly triggers a fear of the unknown, and can put the player in a state of panic. It’s the same concept used by Lovecraft, or any good creator of horror, who realizes the most crippling dread comes from a person’s own imagination.      We chose IndieGoGo because it's a very open funding platform, and we hope to raise enough money to make a high quality game. We've decided to use IndieGoGo because we feel we can innovate by remaining independent and free from the creative boundaries of a publisher. This is what makes developing games so special to us, it's fun, it's innovative, we get to share with you, and we feel the need to create. By contributing to our campaign you will empower that idea and make this happen.We're now at the point in development where we have finished the core gameplay, but there is still a lot of production, as well as a ton of polishing and testing left to do. We want to take our time and make the game as good as possible.We need your funding to help us keep our staff on full-time and hire additional staff to speed up production of the game without lowering our expectations to the quality of the finished game, or delay the release. We hope this Indiegogo will help us deliver the best possible experience that we can.  RYM Games is an independent game studio based in Morocco founded by former developers from Ubisoft, We’ve worked on multiple titles such Prince of Persia and Rayman. The Conjuring House is the studio’s first title, a  paranormale horror experience which aims to bring back the old-school horror feeling. Our mission is to create interactive experiences in which the player goes on an unforgettable journey.     The Conjuring House in the media: - Gamasutra   Fear and foreboding are design pillars in The Conjuring House Designing for fear is also about leveraging the power of suggestion, which if done properly triggers a fear of the unknown, and can put the player in a state of panic, says Kharijah. It’s the same concept used by Lovecraft, or any good creator of horror, who realizes the most crippling dread comes from a person’s own imagination. “Imagination stays very important in creating successful and original situations of fear,” Kharijah says.http://www.gamasutra.com/view/news/215699/Fear_and_foreboding_are_design_pillars_in_The_Conjuring_House.php - Gameblog:   The Conjuring House, le nouveau jeu d'horreur indépendantFrançais : Il s'agit là d'un jeu d'horreur qui, d'après cette première vidéo, s'inscrit dans la lignée d'Outlast... la première bande-annonce - disponible ci-dessus - donne sacrément envie et laisse présager un titre prometteur. We look forward to see more.http://www.gameblog.fr/news/42294-video-the-conjuring-house-le-nouveau-jeu-d-horreur-independa    SKY NEWS coverage:  The conjuring House around the world:Real O Virtual:http://www.realovirtual.com/es/noticias/613/the-conjuring-house-terror-en-indiegogovg247: http://www.vg247.it/2014/04/19/annunciato-the-conjuring-house/ Behindgameshttp://www.behindgames.com/conjuring-house-announced-new-paranormal-horror-game-coming-pc/

story:
5asideCHESS – let’s get people sharing and playing – buy one for yourself or better still take it to your favourite coffee bar, pub, restaurant or waiting place and gift it to them so everyone can play courtesy of you.


We came up with the 5aside chess game because we want to do our bit to change the world. We want to get people talking to each other again. We believe the simple act of playing a game in public is where strangers can become friends. We want to bring people together and share the love of interacting, away from the office, sharing time, relaxing and having fun.


Success comes when people act together, failure tends to happen alone.

We live in a world where finding fault in others seems to be the favourite blood sport. It has long been the basis of politics. It is the theme of much television programming across the world. It sells newspapers. Whenever we meet anyone, our first, almost unconscious reaction may be to look for imperfections.

Shackled away, we fall prey to the constraints of work, dreaming of what we would like to be knowing full well it will never transpire. We have that strength, that passion to achieve our goal and become a better person but very few use that power.

Disconnect from the online network and embrace the intrigue that exists when you meet someone you know nothing about. Who knows what you'll discover or where it may take you?


white to move


Playing 5 aside chess is exciting, educational and social. Education is the greatest power we have. United, we can combine our knowledge to be even greater and all this while playing a game of 5 aside chess.

The shorter gameplay and easy to learn rules mean anyone can join in. With extensive health, what is not to love?

We are the antibodies kicking while the planet fights its fever. Join the revolution - be a game changer.


Chess, the game of Kings. And you can see why when you look at the benefits. 5 aside Chess removes the misconception that this game is only for the geniuses amongst us by making it accessible to everyone. The advantages of this include:

· Improves social skills, memory, spatial skills, numerical abilities, verbal aptitude, creative thinking, problem solving, and reasoning skills

· Raises IQ

· Helps prevent Alzheimer’s

· Improves concentration

· Helps grow dendrites that conduct brain signals

· Teaches planning and foresight

· Better brain function

· Improved cognitive abilities

· Improves strategic thinking

· Meeting interesting people

· Provides travel opportunities to visit worldwide tournaments

                                       

This is how our funds will be divided

 

In the event we don’t make our target, we have prioritised areas to use the money most efficiently. As a result and in accordance with our vision to bring people together, we will use the funds to secure coffee houses and coupled with our wish to combine fun and health will acquire contracts for schools and hospitals.

This would allow the company to reach the market place and grow in stature to then broaden into further avenues just at an albeit slower pace. Our marketing and launch event would be smaller and funded by the proceeds of sales.


5 aside Chess is designed to be accessible by all and if we exceed our goal this is what we'll do!!

  • Postal chess – Connecting to correspondence chess companies and utilising their outlets to spread 5 aside Chess to the 3.6 billion people worldwide without internet access.

  • Sourcing a supplier of checkers pieces to go in the bag as well.

  • Expanding to a range of carry bags that allow you to store you tablet or laptop, and then a game of 5 aside chess on your lunch.

                  


  • Website and Facebook app – Creating the Facebook app to allow play of 5 aside Chess to over 1.5 billion users

                         


  • 5 aside Chess dating nights in partnership with a major dating site providing a unique way to meet new people while taking the stress out of finding conversation

story:
UPDATE: Thank you to everyone who supported our Indiegogo campaign. Through the combined efforts of the public and ourselves, we are progressing forward towards developing a test for Zika Virus. Stay tuned for further developments.

With the Rio Olympics only months away, Ubiquitome wants to reduce the potential impact of Zika by making a diagnostic test widely available. By knowing whether or not they have contracted the virus, people can get treatment and minimize the risk of infecting others.

Ubiquitome was formed to realize a vision of ubiquitous genomics. For serious diseases like Zika that means giving people access to a test faster, cheaper and more flexibly. 

The US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) have invited organizations like Ubiquitome to develop tests for Zika through its emergency use authorization (EUA) process. We are currently developing a test and need funding to get our test authorized by the FDA. Our plan is to make the tests available throughout the US and ultimately anywhere in the world by leveraging our mobile molecular testing technology.

Ubiquitome is pioneering mobile molecular testing to detect pathogens like Zika. The company’s first product - the Freedom4 - is the world’s first mobile, handheld DNA testing device. Based on real time PCR, it offers gold standard performance, eliminating the delays encountered with today's laboratory-based testing.

Towards the end of 2015, we developed a test for Ebola and demonstrated the capacity of the Freedom4 to perform at the same level as gold standard instruments with unprecedented mobility and responsiveness. The FDA’s call for diagnostic tests for Zika, and the clear need for tools to stop the Zika outbreak, especially with the Olympics only a few months away, is the primary motivation for our campaign.

The Zika test Ubiquitome is developing is based on real time PCR (RT-PCR). Real time PCR is the most common type of molecular diagnostic and is often used to diagnose viral infections like Zika. 

Ubiquitome has developed the world’s first commercial mobile, handheld real time PCR device, the Freedom4. The Freedom4 uses a laser to illuminate the sample. Zika virus has its own unique genetic signature that when combined with the test being developed by Ubiquitome, reflects light to an optical sensor and is detected by the Freedom4.

Once it is authorized by the FDA, Ubiquitome plans to make the Zika test available on the Freedom4, as well as within the US through a CLIA certified laboratory, in time for the Olympics.

It is becoming clear that Zika may have serious health impacts. Knowing your status allows you to have informed discussions with your medical provider, as well as your family about how to mitigate the potential impact of your infection. For more information on Zika, we highly recommend this interview from The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention head, Tom Frieden.

This infographic from the Economist shows the risk of the Zika virus spreading.

Zika is a disease transmitted by Aedes mosquitoes. Symptoms can include mild fever, skin rashes, conjunctivitis, muscle and joint pain, or headache. These symptoms normally last for 2-7 days. The virus is circulating in Africa, the Americas, Asia and the Pacific.

Outbreaks of Zika have been linked with the autoimmune disease Guillain-Barré syndrome (GBS) and an increase in babies born with microcephaly.

According to the World Health Organization there is no specific treatment or vaccine currently available. They recommend the best form of prevention is protection against mosquito bites.

While Zika is transmitted to people through the bite of an infected Aedes mosquito, sexual transmission of Zika virus has also been reported.

Zika virus diagnosis can only be confirmed by laboratory testing for the presence of Zika virus RNA in the blood or other body fluids, such as urine or saliva. According to the FDA, ‘there are no commercially available diagnostic tests cleared by the FDA’. 

Over 10,000 athletes will compete at the Rio Olympics from 5 August to 21 August 2016 in Rio De Janiero, Brazil, center of the current Zika outbreak. Up to 500,000 more fans, officials and other supporters will also attend. 200,000 of these are expected to be from the USA.

While the Zika virus does not pose any major health risks directly to the people contracting it, the downstream impact of the virus, especially on pregnant women, is worrying health officials. Testing is seen as one way of reducing the global spread of Zika post-Olympics.

We will use your money to accelerate our product development program, get validation of our Zika test, and submit it to the FDA for authorization.

The more money we raise the faster we will be able to bring our Zika test through the authorization process and get it into the hands of the people that need it. 

Ubiquitome is a New Zealand-based developer of handheld, cloud connected real time PCR devices. The company’s Freedom4 is the first commercially available handheld, battery powered device to offer gold standard real-time PCR performance wherever it is needed. Visit www.ubiquitomebio.com.

The Ubiquitome team comprises top scientists and engineers in the US and New Zealand, including the inventors of the technology at Otago University, one of New Zealand’s top health research Universities. Our disciplines cover molecular biology, virology, mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, optical engineering and manufacturing engineering.

1. Where do I get a test done?

We will mail you a package so you can provide a sample at your convenience. This is then sent to our laboratories where the results will be analyzed and provided to you or your physician as appropriate.

2. What countries is it available in?

Upon FDA authorization the test will initially be available only in the US, although we plan to add additional jurisdictions subject to appropriate regulatory requirements.

3. How reliable is the test?

In general, molecular diagnostic tests are some of the most accurate, sensitive and reliable tests for viral infections like Zika. Specific data around this will be part of our FDA submission and will be made available at the time of authorization.

4. Is the test FDA approved?

Not yet. Our intention is to seek authorization for our test from the FDA through its emergency use authorization mechanism.

5. How confident are you that the test will be authorized and available in time for the Olympics?

We offer no guarantees that our test will be authorized or available in time for the Olympics, however we have had very promising outcomes from a validation study around Ebola. The FDA also focuses resources on emergency use authorization filings to expedite authorization of new diagnostic tests. Both factors give us reasonable confidence that our test will be authorized and available for the Olympics. 

6. Can I get Ubiquitome's mobile molecular test?

We plan to make the mobile molecular test based on the Freedom4 available following FDA authorization. 

7. I have another really important application for the Freedom4, how can I get one for this?

Follow-up with us at www.ubiquitomebio.com. Please note that the Freedom4 is an investigational use only device. Its performance characteristics have not yet been established.

Ubiquitome has developed the world’s first commercial mobile, handheld real time PCR device, the Freedom4. The Freedom4 uses a laser to illuminate the sample. Zika virus has its own unique genetic signature that when combined with the test being developed by
Ubiquitome, reflects light to an optical sensor and is detected by the Freedom4.
Once it is authorized by the FDA, Ubiquitome plans to make the Zika test available on the Freedom4, as well as within the US through a CLIA certified laboratory, in time for the Olympics.

It is becoming clear that Zika may have serious health impacts. Knowing your status allows you to have informed discussions with your medical provider, as well as your family about how to mitigate the potential impact of your infection. For more information on Zika, we highly recommend this interview from The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention head, Tom Frieden.





This infographic from the Economist shows the risk of the Zika virus spreading.
Zika is a disease transmitted by Aedes mosquitoes. Symptoms can include mild fever, skin rashes, conjunctivitis, muscle and joint pain, or headache. These symptoms normally last for 2-7 days. The virus is circulating in Africa, the Americas, Asia and the Pacific.
Outbreaks of Zika have been linked with the autoimmune disease Guillain-Barré syndrome (GBS) and an increase in babies born with microcephaly.
According to the World Health Organization there is no specific treatment or vaccine currently available. They recommend the best form of prevention is protection against mosquito bites.
While Zika is transmitted to people through the bite of an infected Aedes mosquito, sexual transmission of Zika virus has also been reported.

Zika virus diagnosis can only be confirmed by laboratory testing for the presence of Zika virus RNA in the blood or other body fluids, such as urine or saliva. According to the FDA, ‘there are no commercially available diagnostic tests cleared by the FDA’. 

Over 10,000 athletes will compete at the Rio Olympics from 5 August to 21 August 2016 in Rio De Janiero, Brazil, center of the current Zika outbreak. Up to 500,000 more fans, officials and other supporters will also attend. 200,000 of these are expected to be from the USA.
While the Zika virus does not pose any major health risks directly to the people
contracting it, the downstream impact of the virus, especially on pregnant women, is worrying health officials. Testing is seen as one way of reducing the global spread of Zika post-Olympics.


We will use your money to accelerate our product development program, get validation of our Zika test, and submit it to the FDA for authorization.
The more money we raise the faster we will be able to bring our Zika test through the authorization process and get it into the hands of the people that need it. 




Ubiquitome is a New Zealand-based developer of handheld, cloud connected real time PCR devices. The company’s Freedom4 is the first commercially available handheld, battery powered device to offer gold standard real-time PCR performance wherever it is needed. Visit www.ubiquitomebio.com.

The Ubiquitome team comprises top scientists and engineers in the US and New Zealand, including the inventors of the technology at Otago University, one of New Zealand’s top health research Universities. Our disciplines cover molecular biology, virology, mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, optical engineering and manufacturing engineering.

1. Where do I get a test done?
We will mail you a package so you can provide a sample at your convenience. This is then sent to our laboratories where the results will be analyzed and provided to you or your physician as appropriate.
2. What countries is it available in?
Upon FDA authorization the test will initially be available only in the US, although we plan to add additional jurisdictions subject to appropriate regulatory requirements.
3. How reliable is the test?
In general, molecular diagnostic tests are some of the most accurate, sensitive and reliable tests
for viral infections like Zika. Specific data around this will be part of our FDA submission and will be made available at the time of authorization.
4. Is the test FDA approved?
Not yet. Our intention is to seek authorization for our test from the FDA through its
emergency use authorization mechanism.
5. How confident are you that the test will be authorized and available in time for
the Olympics?
We offer no guarantees that our test will be authorized or available in time for the Olympics, however we have had very promising outcomes from a validation study around Ebola. The FDA also focuses resources on emergency use authorization filings to expedite authorization of new diagnostic tests. Both factors give us reasonable confidence that our test will be authorized and available for the Olympics. 6. Can I get Ubiquitome's mobile molecular test?We plan to make the mobile molecular test based on the Freedom4 available following FDA authorization. 7. I have another really important application for the Freedom4, how can I get one for this?Follow-up with us at www.ubiquitomebio.com. Please note that the Freedom4 is an investigational use only device. Its performance characteristics have not yet been established.

story:
What is Which One?

It is a mobile application where each user selects the ownmost choices in many different categories and find your soulmate.

What do we have Which One?
Which one, containing hundreds of questions within 7 categories, provides you to meet people with the answers closest to you.

Here is my project presentation: 

http://www.slideshare.net/arKamaz/which-one-project-presentation

Tens of Different Categories  

There are many categories such as sports, music, politics, culture, brands, fashion, celebrities, and confab to specify your fields of interest.


 Find the Closest Person to You

It is an application where you can find familiar people to you around the world, your country and Facebook and communicate with them. 

Gain Presents from the Brands!

Answer the questions of brand category, grab a chance to get presents!

Users’ Characters 

Character analyses and interests which the users’ personalities are inclined to will be presented depending on their choices.

Facebook Connect

The users will connect via Facebook, easily integrating their information with WhichOne. 

Matching Up Options

The user will have three matching up options: Worldwide, countrywide or Facebook Friends-wide.

Categorical or Mixed Questions
The user may prefer specific questions on the basis of a category and also answer mixed questions. Furthermore, the much-discussed topics at issue will be informed by  sending notification
Messaging in Application

The user will message the other users he or she matched up. 


Differences of Which One

Which One Revenue Model 

 What are the income channels?

The premium membership for each user after certain numbers of matching up according to their interests. Reporting of data analyses according to the answers the users give and rendering the reports to target audience analyses for firms. Conducting expectation survey and organizing campaigns of a new product in the application.

story:
Important information: 
GoE has been launched into Steam Early Access on 13th December 2016. If you back our campaign now and choose a Perk with a Steam Key, we will manually email your key (check your spam-filter)! If you do not want to wait you can also buy on our website or on Steam.  

SCROLL DOWN FOR FULL ENGLISH TEXT!

 

Wichtige Info: 
Die englische Version von GoE ist am 13. Dezember 2016 auf Steam Early Access gestartet; die Deutsche Version ist dank der erfolgreichen Kampagne bereits in Arbeit. Wenn du uns jetzt hier unterstützt senden wir dir manuell den Steam Key und du kannst bereits die englische Version spielen!

Alternativ kannst du das Spiel auch hier auf unserer Webseite kaufen oder direkt bei Steam!

 

Kurze Zusammenfassung

Guardians of Ember ist das neue Hack'n'Slash MMO vom preisgekrönten Entwicklerstudio Runewaker (z.B. Runes of Magic oder Dragon’s Prophet). Das Spiel ist aktuell auf Englisch verfügbar und mittels dieser Kampagne bereiten wir die deutsche Übersetzung vor!

Alle Informationen zum Spiel könnt ihr auf unserer offiziellen Steam-Seite finden.

 

Features: 
- Doppel-Klassen-System (ab Level 15)

 

- nahezu unendliche Charakteroptimierung (4 Rassen, 6 Klassen, über 300 aktive und passive Fähigkeiten)

- zufällig generierte Dungeons mit individuellen Schwierigkeitsgraden
- Handwerk- und Verzauberungssystem: Erstelle Deine perfekte Ausrüstung
- Hausbau: Dekoriere Dein eigenes Haus mit hunderten Gegenständen

 

 

- Spannende Geschichte mit hunderten Aufgaben
- verschiedene Spieler-gegen-Spieler Optionen (1v1, 3v3, 5v5 - freies Spiel und Ligamodus)


Mit dieser Indiegogo-Kampagne könnt ihr die Übersetzung ins Deutsche unterstützen - aber selbst wenn Du keine deutsche Version benötigst, ist dies hier die beste Gelegenheit, um sich einen Steamkey für den Early Access zu schnappen und anderes, cooles Zeug (z.B. Shirt, BBQ) abzusahnen. PS: Wenn du eine andere Größe möchtest als L oder XL kontaktiere uns bitte vor deiner Bestellung!
 

 

Was WIR brauchen und was was DU dafür bekommst

  • Als kleiner unabhängiger Publisher haben wir leider keine Ressourcen für mehrere Übersetzungen gleichzeitig.

  • Einige von euch haben bereits nach einer deutschen Version gefragt.

  • Zeig uns, dass Du die deutsche Version wirklich willst und unterstütze diese Indigogo-Kampagne!

  • Als Dankeschön unsererseits für deine Unterstützung haben wir einige nette Pakete zusammengeschnürt (die nicht nur das Spiel an sich beinhalten, dass Du in der englischen Version ab Dezember spielen kannst, sondern auch Shirts, Grillen mit dem GoE Team und vieles mehr!).

  • Mehr Information über die GoE-Editionen findest Du auf Steam.

  • Aber um die wichtigste Frage hier zu beantworten:

    Natürlich kann man mit allen Editionen den Inhalt des gesamten Spiels erleben. Wir werden Early Access mit zwei Akten und fünf Klassen starten, werden aber die weiteren Inhalte für alle Editionen verfügbar machen.

    Darüber hinaus erhalten Spieler, die die Demigod Edition erwerben eine exklusive PvP Pose sowie die Guardian-Rüstung (reines Kostüm, keine Spielvorteile).

    Wenn Du die Immortal Edition kaufst, erhältst Du alles aus der Demigod Edition plus ein permanentes Reittier, den Säbelzahntiger, sowie den digitalen Soundtrack (90 Minuten).

 

Die Auswirkungen

  • Da das Kampagnenziel bereits erreicht ist, planen wir eine erste Version mit einem deutschen User-Interface im Januar 2017.

  • Kommende Inhalte werden dann in Englisch und Deutsch veröffentlicht, sobald die deutsche Version komplett fertig ist (voraussichtlich Q2 2017).

 

Risiken und Herausforderungen

 

  • Der Testserver läuft bereits und wir testen mit frühen Backern die englische Version auf Herz und Nieren. Der Early Access-Start war am 13. Dezember 2016.

  • Da der Client bereits über die "Sprachauswahl-Funktion" verfügt, besteht keine technische Hürde - das Hauptrisiko ist also eine verspätete deutsche Version

  • Natürlich kannst Du die englische Version bereits ab Start der Early Access Phase spielen :)

 

Andere Möglichkeiten uns zu unterstützen

Selbst wenn Du eine englische Version bevorzugst, ist diese Kampagne für Dich interessant: Wir freuen uns natürlich auch, wenn Du einfach so Deinen Early Access Key via IndieGoGo kaufst um einer der ersten Spieler auf dem Server zu sein und dich an die Spitze des Rankings zu kämpfen!
 

Und selbst wenn Du grad nicht flüssig bist und dir ein Bundle momentan nicht leisten kannst: Erzähl einfach deinen Freunden, Arbeitskollegen oder Gildenmitglieder von uns!

 

 

Kontakt

Hast Du noch Fragen? Kontaktiere uns einfach:

  • Email: info@inselgames.com
  • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/guardiansofember/
  • Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/463680 
  • FAQ: http://bit.ly/2byyy9r 
  • Imprint: http://guardiansofember.com/imprint.html  
 

Disclaimer: Leider ist es nur möglich, uns aus der EU, USA, Kanada und Schweiz zu unterstützen. Dies ist ebenfalls der Grund dafür, warum wir eure Anschrift brauchen, selbst wenn ihr nur einen Steam Key erwerbt.

-----------

 

Short Summary

From the award-winning development studio Runewaker (e.g. Runes of Magic and Dragon's Prophet), Guardians of Ember is Guardians of Ember is a unique combination of Hack'n'Slash and traditional MMORPG with a focus on action oriented combat in PVE and PVP as well as near endless character optimization.  

All information about the game can be found at the official Steam page.

After several technical tests (CBTs) we have launched on Steam Early Access for Europe and North America - and thanks to our stretch goal being reached we will open with our Iron Hero Event on the first weekend! 

Features: 
- dual class system (available from level 15) 

 

- near unlimited character optimization (4 races, 6 classes, over 300 of active and passive skills) 

 

- randomized dungeons with individual difficulty settings 
- crafting and enchanting system: Design your perfect equipment 
- housing system: Decorate your own house with hundreds of items 

 

- engaging story with hundreds of quests 
- various PVP options (1vs1, 3vs3, 5vs5 - ranked and unranked)

 

This Indiegogo campaign is to support the additional German localization for the game - but even if you don't need a German (or other) language version this campaign is the right place for you to grab your Guardians of Ember key or an exclusive shirt! (Please contact us for different sizes).

What We Need & What You Get

  • As a small independent publisher we simply cannot afford localizations for several languages before first revenues are coming in. Several German players asked us for a localized version as soon as possible.
  • Grab your Steamkey via this Indiegogo campaign now and support the German localization with this purchase - once we achieve the campaign goal we start the localization right away
  • As a thank you for your support we created some nice bundles (not only Steam keys for the Early Access version but you can get exclusive shirts or BBQ with the team).
  • Here you can get an overview about the planned editions: GoE Packages

  • But to answer the most important question here: 
    It will, of course, be possible to explore the same content with all three editions. Although we are launching Early Access with only two Acts and five Classes, all five Acts and all six Classes will be accessible to everyone.

    Players who decide to get the extended Demigod edition will receive an exclusive Guardians costume plus some nice add-ons like an exclusive Title or a special PVP Victory pose.

     

    If you buy the Immortal edition you get everything from the Demigod edition plus we add a permanent Sabretooth mount and the digital soundtrack containing more than ninety minutes of epic GoE music.

     

The Impact

  • Due to the fact that the campaign is already reached we plan to release a version with German UI in December 2016.
  • Upcoming content will be released in English and German once the final German version is done (most likely end of Q1 2017).
  • In addition we'll release an Iron Man feature together with the Early Access launch as the campaign reached 20.000 USD.
 

Risks & Challenges

The test server is already running and we are heavily testing the English version at the moment. 
Because the client is already multi language ready there should be no technical hurdle - the major risk is a delayed delivery of the German version (especially if the campaign goal is not met).
However, the Steamkeys can be used for the English version, too - even if the German version is delayed everyone can start playing once Early Access starts! :)
 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Even if you prefer an English version we appreciate your support via this Indiegogo campaign - every online game depends on its community and we are happy if you join the Guardians of Ember when we launch in December: 

    If you get your key right now you have the chance to be one of the first players on the servers and fight your way to the top!

    Even if you cannot afford one of our bundles right now we really appreciate if you share this campaign with your friends and guild mates!

     


    Contact us

    Any questions? Just drop us a line:

     

    • Email: info@inselgames.com
    • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/guardiansofember/
    • Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/463680 
    • FAQ: http://bit.ly/2byyy9r 
    • Imprint: http://guardiansofember.com/imprint.html  
     

     

    Disclaimer: Unfortunately it is only possible to back this IndieGoGo campaign if you are from EU, USA, Canada or Switzerland. 

    This is also the reason why we have to request your address even if you buy a Steamkey only.

Hast Du noch Fragen? Kontaktiere uns einfach:

story:
UPDATE: The full game has been launched in BETA. You can download and play it at http://bouncervr.com

BouncerVR is a virtual reality arcade game for PC, Mac, Linux* and Oculus Rift. The game is a tribute to games of the past. Simple to play, yet engaging and challenging. In the game, you control a shield with only your vision. With this shield you bounce a ball towards the enemy. You score a point when the enemy is unable to bounce back the ball.

You can collect various power-ups to help you reach your goal. Some power-ups speed up or resize the ball, while others change the gameplay dramatically. Play through various levels and unlock new types of power-ups in the process.

While this game is made from the ground up for the Oculus Rift virtual reality glasses, it can also be played without them by using your mouse. Playing the game in VR gives you the advantage of depth perception thus you can see the ball and power-ups coming towards you and guess their distance and speed. 

I am one of those people who becomes motion sick very quickly while using the Rift. With this project I succeeded in creating a game that doesn't have this effect on me. I think this is mainly because you don't move around in the virtual world.

The game uses only your head movement as input controls. No need to fumble around with gamepads or mouse and keyboard. Just put on the rift and play.

Want your logo here? Sponsor us

Because I really believe this game is something a lot of people will enjoy, I have put my own time and money into the development of a playable alpha created with Unity3D. This crowd funding project is as much a test to see if people are interested as it is a way to collect money to turn this alpha into a fun game.

Back to top

 

Downloads disabled*

* We are currently changing some of the core game dynamics. Our current demo doesn't represent the game concept fully. Check back here for more news and updates.

 

If we reach our crowd funding goal I will finish the base version of the game by november 2013. If we don't reach our goal we will still build the base game, but it will take longer. Take a look at our risks section for more information.

The base game will have the following features:

- Native Oculus Rift support.

- Playable without Oculus Rift.

- 10 different power-ups.

- 20 different levels.

- Better sound effects and background music.

- Freestyle game mode: Play a random level with a random set of power-ups.

- Improved enemy AI.

- Account server to manage your profile and stats.

Back to top

I would love to create a mobile version of the game. Imagine your phone or tablet as a window into the virtual world. When you move your device you can look around in this world. By facing your device towards the enemy goal, you will be able to position your shield and bounce back the ball.

Back to top

Everyone loves achievements. In this goal I will create a system where various stats are logged about the way you play the game. Some actions will unlock badges, others secret power-up types. With these stats you will compete in high score ladders with other players.

Back to top 

While this stretch goal will be the most time consuming to create, this is my personal favorite. A realtime multiplayer feature brings the game to a whole new level. Play against actual humans beings, invent new ways to use the power-ups to your advantage, challenge friends and unlock unique multiplayer power-ups.

Back to top

Many people I showed my game alpha to asked me if they would be able to share their result, stats and progress on facebook. They want to play together with their facebook friends and get all the social aspects most popular games have today. If we reach this stretch goal I will make this happen. Also check out the idea box to post suggestions and remarks.

Some people gave me the remark that the 'social integration' stretch goal was rubbish. Because of that I have decided to open up this stretch goal so the community can redefine it.

Back to top

In total, creating the alpha has cost me $5,512.00. This number includes the time I took off from my day job to build, test and polish the software. I also bought some third party code and graphics to make the final result more appealing. 

If we reach this stretch goal, it means a lot of people really believe in our project. I think it would be fair if I was able to recovered my initial investment in this game so I can go on to build, extend and update this and future projects.

Back to top

My name is Tom Vergult. Due to my passion for software I started programming at a very early age. Aside from my main activity, building high performance Drupal websites as a senior consultant, my big ambition is to become a successful gaming consultant who is able to bring a more meaningful experience to gaming in general.

In 2002 I bought a small online gaming engine called 'First Star Online'. In the years to follow I have rewritten this software and built one of the first free community centered MMORPG's with the engine. Today, 11 years later, TerraWorld is outdated but still online for everyone who wants to play.

I have also been involved in a number of other projects on various platforms such as normal desktop, facebook and mobile android/iPhone/iPad.

Most recently I have built a storytelling game platform for our national broadcasting company "VRT".

You can check out my LinkedIn profile for more information about myself and my curriculum.

ps: Just like my Avatar I'm ginger in real life too ;)

Back to top

Because I have a lot of experience in game development the risks of this project are very limited.

If I reach my campaign goal I will be able to take some time off my day job to work on the game and I will have no problem to deliver the base game on time.

If I don't reach my campaign goal however, I will still create the base game for all the people who pledged, but it might take a little longer. I think everyone will agree this is reasonable enough.

As for the stretch goals, it is hard to put an exact date on them. I will however make sure the game receives updates frequently. This means I will release the stretch goals over the months following the release of the base game.

Back to top

The stretch goals I have currently added to the project are thought up and defined by me. I strongly believe that YOU as a player would be much better in defining stretch goals.

Because of this I have set up an 'Idea Box' in which all of you can post your suggestions, features and remarks. You can also vote other ideas up or down depending on how well you like them.

The ideas in this idea box will have an impact on the road map and feature list of the game. If an idea is possible to add to the game and you, as a crowd, think it would be better than an existing goal I will change my plans. Ultimately it will be all of you that define the future of the game.

Everyone who brings forth an idea that I eventually use, will be mentioned in the credits of the game.

Back to top

 

* Not all ideas will be accepted. Ideas need to be both viable and achievable in the predefined development time-frame.

** We reserve the right to deny names and nicknames if we consider them to be inappropriate.

*** Oculus Rift model and graphics by William Burke. Thanks many times!
story_txt:
UPDATE: The full game has been launched in BETA. You can download and play it at http://bouncervr.com

BouncerVR is a virtual reality arcade game for PC, Mac, Linux* and Oculus Rift. The game is a tribute to games of the past. Simple to play, yet engaging and challenging. In the game, you control a shield with only your vision. With this shield you bounce a ball towards the enemy. You score a point when the enemy is unable to bounce back the ball.
You can collect various power-ups to help you reach your goal. Some power-ups speed up or resize the ball, while others change the gameplay dramatically. Play through various levels and unlock new types of power-ups in the process.
While this game is made from the ground up for the Oculus Rift virtual reality glasses, it can also be played without them by using your mouse. Playing the game in VR gives you the advantage of depth perception thus you can see the ball and power-ups coming towards you and guess their distance and speed. 
I am one of those people who becomes motion sick very quickly while using the Rift. With this project I succeeded in creating a game that doesn't have this effect on me. I think this is mainly because you don't move around in the virtual world.
The game uses only your head movement as input controls. No need to fumble around with gamepads or mouse and keyboard. Just put on the rift and play.




Want your logo here? Sponsor us

Because I really believe this game is something a lot of people will enjoy, I have put my own time and money into the development of a playable alpha created with Unity3D. This crowd funding project is as much a test to see if people are interested as it is a way to collect money to turn this alpha into a fun game.
Back to top
 
Downloads disabled** We are currently changing some of the core game dynamics. Our current demo doesn't represent the game concept fully. Check back here for more news and updates.
 

If we reach our crowd funding goal I will finish the base version of the game by november 2013. If we don't reach our goal we will still build the base game, but it will take longer. Take a look at our risks section for more information.
     
The base game will have the following features:
- Native Oculus Rift support.
- Playable without Oculus Rift.
- 10 different power-ups.
- 20 different levels.
- Better sound effects and background music.
- Freestyle game mode: Play a random level with a random set of power-ups.
- Improved enemy AI.
- Account server to manage your profile and stats.
Back to top

I would love to create a mobile version of the game. Imagine your phone or tablet as a window into the virtual world. When you move your device you can look around in this world. By facing your device towards the enemy goal, you will be able to position your shield and bounce back the ball.
Back to top

Back to top 

While this stretch goal will be the most time consuming to create, this is my personal favorite. A realtime multiplayer feature brings the game to a whole new level. Play against actual humans beings, invent new ways to use the power-ups to your advantage, challenge friends and unlock unique multiplayer power-ups.

Some people gave me the remark that the 'social integration' stretch goal was rubbish. Because of that I have decided to open up this stretch goal so the community can redefine it.
Back to top

If we reach this stretch goal, it means a lot of people really believe in our project. I think it would be fair if I was able to recovered my initial investment in this game so I can go on to build, extend and update this and future projects.

story:
Our Story

Gosulife was born in the heart of a true nerd and gamer! I started this project about one year ago as I decided to persue my goal of helping E-Sports grow to its full potential.

Gosulife is going to be a non-profit StarCraft 2 Tournament Community with the purpose of hosting frequent StarCraft 2 tournaments, always with sponsor cash prize pools of respectable size. As opposed to other tournament sites, Gosulife will be focusing on having an international image (in other words, we'll be available in US, EU and ASIA). Our goal is to give anyone the opportunity to become a professional gamer, even though they might not be represented by a huge organization or company.

Until today I've invested all of my savings into this project. This money got me the general design of the website (the one you see in the video above). I'm now out of saved up money and I live on my own, meaning that my monthly income goes to rent and food. As of today, I'm done with the first steps in the process, but I REALLY want to make my vision a reality and launch Gosulife, and this is where YOU GUYS come in!


The Impact

We will launch WORLD WIDE from DAY ONE! The site will be available in English from day one. We will have different tournaments in different timezones to keep laging to a minimum.

With vastly advanced REPLAY ARCHIVES both players and viewers will be able to browse through replays and VOD's from their favorite players and tournaments based on a huge number of filters, such as APM, winning race, length of the game, units used, only final games etc.

ALSO FEATURING:
  • Rankings. See every statistic conceivable. Best win/loss ratio, most lost games as a specific race, highest average APM, highest amount of comments/forum posts etc!
  • Highly advanced forum and comments system!
  • Possibility to host your own private or public tournaments!
  • Bronze-Gold Tournaments based on in game account stats as well as statistics from Gosulife and replays!
  • AND MUCH MORE!

    A platform for both PLAYERS AND VIEWERS! We want everyone to enjoy Gosulife, whether you're in Masters league, Broze league or simply a fan of viewing a fine VOD or live StarCraft II live stream. We hope that by launching the best Online Tournament Community in the world we might also have some of the best online tournaments in the world. This means top notch Streams and VOD's for you guys!

    What We Need & What You Get

    Building a website like this is very expensive. However the company that made the Gosulife design has promised me that if I can crowdfund this project they will take on the job, finish the design and build the website, even though the total costs will be a lot higher!

    The money you give will go 100% to the development of the website (Planning, coding, design). This means:

    • The money will NOT go to travel expenses.
    • The money will NOT go to renting of equipment.
    • The money will NOT go to accommodation.
    • The money will NOT go to food.

    NOTE: We will be publishing the itemized invoice AND a video interview with the web design agency regarding the project and pricing.

    If you decide to fund this project you will of course be rewarded. As stated in the video above, take a look at the perks to the right to get a gist of what you can get - Don't miss out on a COACH LESSON with Steven 'Destiny' Bonnell II or a recurring tournament in YOUR name!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Out of cash but still want to help Gosulife? NO PROBLEM!
    There is one really easy, yet highly important, thing you can do - HELP SPREAD THE WORD!

    • Like it on FACEBOOK
    • Post it on TWITTER
    • +1 it on GOOGLE
    • Vote it up on REDDIT
    • E-mail it to your FRIENDS
    • Favorite it here on INDIEGOGO


    Noteworthy:
    Interview in Forbes - About the growing community with Sean "Day[9]" Plott.
    Short video about E-Sports - With $60 billion, GAMING is now LARGER than FILM -industry.
    Destiny's Stream - If you want to watch Destinys stream, look no further!
    Interview in Forbes - What streaming does for gaming with Steven "Destiny" Bonnell II.



    THANK YOU SO MUCH IN ADVANCE FOR HELPING E-SPORTS GROW <3 YOU ALL!

story:
Short Summary

Castles & Chemo, Inc., is dedicated to raise money for cancer research and support in an effort to make cancer a relic of the past, through the use of tabletop role playing games, both by publishing game supplements and organizing & running fundraising events, both in the United States and abroad.
 
During my own cancer treatment, one thing that kept me going week to week was my weekly D&D game, where I stopped being John, fighting cancer, and became Alton the halfling, fighting orcs.  And now, 7 years since my diagnosis, I want to use what helped me get through chemo to help others in their struggle!
 
After our last successful IndieGoGo campaign, we are now officially recognized as a business entity, and will be receiving 501(c)3 status shortly.  Now it's time to move onto the next important piece; exposure!
 
The driving force behind our efforts is getting out there to show people that tabletop games can be used as a force for good.  That's where you come in!

What We Need & What You Get

So here's the skinny.  Going to conventions is expensive.  Almost prohibitively so.  I've estimated my costs to attend a con as big as Gen Con to be somewhere around $2,000, just for the travel and booth alone. 
 
That is what I'm using as a benchmark, since being able to represent Castles & Chemo at Gen Con is what I consider as my brass ring.
 
By supporting this campaign, you'll be helping me achieve that.  As thanks, I have several perks in store; adventures, shirts, and a chance to run a special 6 hour session of Castles & Chemo at Gen Con.  Plus a bunch of other things in mind for stretch goals!
 
UPDATE: Any backer of $25 or more will get a PDF of the "IndieGoGo© Collection," the $10 reward perk.
 
UPDATE: Backers will also receive papercraft miniatures to go with the adventures received as part of their perk.

Other Ways You Can Help

As I mentioned before, exposure is key to the success of my efforts.  The exposure I've already gained has been a major help, but there's always more good to be done.  Spread the word!  Either through this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and Goodle+, but also on Castles & Chemo's pages.
 
Facebook: Castles & Chemo
Google+: Castles & Chemo

story:
Most Players think Fantasy Football is a game for men and orcs (maybe elves or dwarves), until they face an Amazon team. Dodging as stunties and hitting as humans, Girls fight hard. These chicks are worthy of great miniatures so             Willy-miniatures bring you this amazing WM Amazon team.

ABOUT US

Willy-Miniatures is a small company producing high quality miniatures for fantasy football and other miniature games. We offer alternative designs to the ones existing and we provide the players with a wide variety of miniatures to help them complete their teams.
You can see our full catalogue and contact us here
http://willy-miniatures.blogspot.com.es/

This team has been designed and scultped by ªRU-MOR, She is a fantastic ilustrator as well as sculptor, you can see more of her work on
http://eldesvanderu-mor.blogspot.com.es/



WHY CROWDFUNDING ... AGAIN ? And AGAIN?
We had an amazing experience with our late campaigns, shorten the time to cast former team in a incredible way. In addition, all our former campaigns founders are 100% satisfied with our service due to the fact that we care about communication with our customers, quick shipping, quality of our miniatures and best price possible. We still need you to rise funds, that helps us a lot since we can finance new miniatures, obtain feedback from you and it gives us confidence to keep working on. You are essential, YOU make this team a reality.

WM Amazon Team


Some sweeteners from Willy-miniatures range

WM Starplayers


    Amazon Perks


    STRETCH GOALS

    Miniatures will be casted in pewter (white metal)







    Estimated shipping on December 2014 (except level9 which depends on painter schedule)

story:
Welcome

With the launch of Remember Heroes, we can reshape both the way people remember their loved ones and the way we honor our veterans. By decorating, seeing and most importantly sharing the grave of a hero, friends and family members can build a living, interconnected memorial that stands stronger than stone.

Physical location should not prevent someone from honoring a man or woman who has laid everything on the line for our freedom. We want anyone to be able to decorate any veteran’s grave, any time, anywhere. There are about 4.9 million veterans’ graves in all 128 national cemeteries. Upon launch, we can serve 1.7 million of those, roughly one third. Join our cause to help us serve them all.

Remember Heroes Indiegogo

The goal of our company's Indiegogo campaign is twofold:

  1. Raise awareness for Remember Heroes and honor America's veterans by blanketing 2,000 grave-sites with fresh flowers for Veterans Day.

  2. Raise enough money to expand our service to as many of the 128 national cemeteries as we possibly can by Memorial Day, 2014.


Honoring American veterans is central to our mission; our $20,000 goal will help us to place fresh flowers on 2,000 gravesites on Veterans Day. In addition to honoring deceased heroes on Veterans Day, our $20,000 goal will help us to double the number of cemeteries we serve from 10 to 20.

GREEN is where we are, RED is where we are going!

The RH Story

President Mike Merit flying a KC-130, 2003

Our concept was, at its birth, the dream of a Marine who missed his friends. Mike Merit, a disabled veteran and co-founder of our organization, made a wish on Memorial Day 2012 that he could honor his fallen comrades at national cemeteries thousands of miles away without traveling.

He wished that he could somehow see the graves of his brothers and sisters in arms that were lost while serving in Iraq and Afghanistan.

With Mike’s vision, we founded an organization that allows you to remember and honor American heroes in three ways: by putting flowers on their grave, seeing their memorial decorated with those flowers and sharing it with those you love.

At Remember Heroes, we know nothing can come close to the feeling of loyalty that personally visiting the final resting place of your loved ones imparts — and we don’t seek to imitate that. But, we can enable those who can’t make it to the grave themselves, people like Mike, to also honor and remember their heroes.

Our Service, as easy as 1 2 3...4 5 6 7 8

We’ve given you a broad explanation of how our service works; now let us take you step by step through the entire process. Once an order is placed, we accomplish three tasks that allow you to honor your hero in a unique and significant way.

  • We deliver high-quality, fresh and unique floral arrangements to any Veterans grave in a national cemetery.
  • We send back high-resolution images of the gravesite, flower placement and cemetery.
  • We create a secure memorial page with these images and a 360 degree panoramic that you can invite your friends and family to see. Everyone invited can share stories, pictures and videos to remember their fallen hero.

In October, we will be able to take orders on our website for our first ten national cemeteries. When you log on to rememberheroes.org, we will follow an easy process that allows you to choose your veteran and place an order for delivery in the next four business days.

Frequently Asked Questions

What cemeteries do we currently serve?

We will be able to place flowers in ten national cemeteries by the end of the IndieGoGo campaign. These ten national cemeteries are:

  • Arlington National Cemetery
  • Riverside National Cemetery
  • Florida National Cemetery
  • Calverton National Cemetery
  • Jefferson Barracks National Cemetery
  • Ft. Snelling National Cemetery
  • Ft. Logan National Cemetery
  • Ft. Sam Houston National Cemetery
  • Dallas-Ft. Worth National Cemetery
  • National Memorial Cemetery of the Pacific

How will you collect necessary information for delivery of my perk?

If you claim a perk that requires information like your twitter handle, your Hero's story or shirt size, expect an email before the campaign ends asking for that information.

What veterans' organizations do we support?

Right now we are actively searching for veteran service organizations to partner with. If you have any recommendations please don’t hesitate to contact us and help build our network of sponsorships across the country.

How long will it take to get the flowers delivered?

If you place an order for immediate delivery, it takes between 3-4 business days to receive your images back. The main reason for this delay is that each bouquet is built specifically for you and is then shipped after the order is placed.

Who actually delivers the flowers and takes the pictures?

Remember Heroes has placement partners around the country that handle our deliveries and take flowers directly to the National Cemetery. It varies at each location, but partners are active duty military, veterans, sons and daughters of veterans or veteran organizations.

Where do the bouquets come from?

A professional florist in Florida who specializes in large-volume orders arranges the bouquets. We are partnered with Sam’s Club, who helps us transport our flowers to each national cemetery.

Perks
story_txt:
Welcome

With the launch of Remember Heroes, we can reshape both the way people remember their loved ones and the way we honor our veterans.  By decorating, seeing and most importantly sharing the grave of a hero, friends and family members can build a living, interconnected memorial that stands stronger than stone.



Physical location should not prevent someone from honoring a man or woman who has laid everything on the line for our freedom.   We want anyone to be able to decorate any veteran’s grave, any time, anywhere.  There are about 4.9 million veterans’ graves in all 128 national cemeteries.  Upon launch, we can serve 1.7 million of those, roughly one third.  Join our cause to help us serve them all.
Remember Heroes Indiegogo
The goal of our company's Indiegogo campaign is twofold:




Raise awareness for Remember Heroes and honor America's veterans by blanketing 2,000 grave-sites with fresh flowers for Veterans Day.
Raise enough money to expand our service to as many of the 128 national cemeteries as we possibly can by Memorial Day, 2014.

Honoring American veterans is central to our mission; our $20,000 goal will help us to place fresh flowers on 2,000 gravesites on Veterans Day. In addition to honoring deceased heroes on Veterans Day, our $20,000 goal will help us to double the number of cemeteries we serve from 10 to 20.

GREEN is where we are, RED is where we are going!

The RH Story

President Mike Merit flying a KC-130, 2003

Our concept was, at its birth, the dream of a Marine who missed his friends. Mike Merit, a disabled veteran and co-founder of our organization, made a wish on Memorial Day 2012 that he could honor his fallen comrades at national cemeteries thousands of miles away without traveling.
He wished that he could somehow see the graves of his brothers and sisters in arms that were lost while serving in Iraq and Afghanistan.
With Mike’s vision, we founded an organization that allows you to remember and honor American heroes in three ways: by putting flowers on their grave, seeing their memorial decorated with those flowers and sharing it with those you love.
At Remember Heroes, we know nothing can come close to the feeling of loyalty that personally visiting the final resting place of your loved ones imparts — and we don’t seek to imitate that. But, we can enable those who can’t make it to the grave themselves, people like Mike, to also honor and remember their heroes.
Our Service, as easy as 1 2 3...4 5 6 7 8
We’ve given you a broad explanation of how our service works; now let us take you step by step through the entire process.  Once an order is placed, we accomplish three tasks that allow you to honor your hero in a unique and significant way.

We deliver high-quality, fresh and unique floral arrangements to any Veterans grave in a national cemetery.
We send back high-resolution images of the gravesite, flower placement and cemetery.
We create a secure memorial page with these images and a 360 degree panoramic that you can invite your friends and family to see. Everyone invited can share stories, pictures and videos to remember their fallen hero.






In October, we will be able to take orders on our website for our first ten national cemeteries.  When you log on to rememberheroes.org, we will follow an easy process that allows you to choose your veteran and place an order for delivery in the next four business days.

Frequently Asked Questions
What cemeteries do we currently serve?
We will be able to place flowers in ten national cemeteries by the end of the IndieGoGo campaign.  These ten national cemeteries are:

Arlington National Cemetery
Riverside National Cemetery
Florida National Cemetery
Calverton National Cemetery
Jefferson Barracks National Cemetery
Ft. Snelling National Cemetery
Ft. Logan National Cemetery 
Ft. Sam Houston National Cemetery
Dallas-Ft. Worth National Cemetery
National Memorial Cemetery of the Pacific

How will you collect necessary information for delivery of my perk?
If you claim a perk that requires information like your twitter handle, your Hero's story or shirt size, expect an email before the campaign ends asking for that information.
What veterans' organizations do we support?
Right now we are actively searching for veteran service organizations to partner with. If you have any recommendations please don’t hesitate to contact us and help build our network of sponsorships across the country.
How long will it take to get the flowers delivered?
If you place an order for immediate delivery, it takes between 3-4 business days to receive your images back. The main reason for this delay is that each bouquet is built specifically for you and is then shipped after the order is placed.
Who actually delivers the flowers and takes the pictures?
Remember Heroes has placement partners around the country that handle our deliveries and take flowers directly to the National Cemetery.  It varies at each location, but partners are active duty military, veterans, sons and daughters of veterans or veteran organizations.
Where do the bouquets come from?
A professional florist in Florida who specializes in large-volume orders arranges the bouquets. We are partnered with Sam’s Club, who helps us transport our flowers to each national cemetery.
Perks

story:
The Comic Shop That Love Built

We’ve been part of the comics and gaming culture for over 20 years between us (and probably beyond that- likely a lifetime- Steve started playing D&D when he was 7), with two of us having worked at a local spot for over 16 years. Finally, after a number of people telling us if they ever came into some money they would open their own store and have the boys run it, we thought- Hey, we could do this! We WANT to do this!

 

So, that’s what we’re about. We want to open our own comics and gaming store in Uptown Saint John, New Brunswick, Canada, where we can provide you with the latest trends and stories that the industry has to offer in a space that welcomes everyone to participate in whatever form of geekery they find interesting.

 

Why we need your help

We’ve come to find that Geek is hard to sell to investors and banks. We know that the culture is alive and thriving and know without a doubt that this will work and we’ll be so busy we won’t know what to do with ourselves! That’s where you come in. We feel this project is as much about opening a store as it is about a community. So, we’re asking you to invest in this community.

 

Who the heck are we and why are we worthy of your support?

The shop will be set up and managed by Steve Henderson and Chris Duffield.  The boys have been running a local spot for over 20 years between them. They play well together and work well together. Dream team, right? Maybe it’s destiny that these two came together! They have a heart for all forms of geekery and a mind for the business. They provide awesome service and knowledge in the industry and can guide you to new hobbies and interests, if you’re willing to take that journey.

 

Steve’s other half, Tara Henderson, is also involved, but more in a cheerleader type-fashion for the moment. Her job is to help keep the boys on track and help tidy the store while she brushes up on what’s happening in the world of comics and games. Cheesy, right? But, it’s true.

 

Slat Wall, Counter Tops and Display Cases... Oh My!

It's not glamorous stuff, but money raised through this campaign will be used for:

Display cases, slat wall, counter tops, hooks

Point of Sale system- which will track our inventory and help us manage your comic accounts so we can put your comics aside for you!

Renovations! That means flooring, painting, light and a pretty new customer washroom

Chairs- Every gamer knows how important a good chair is for extended gaming time

Tables- Hey, we need a place to game on right?

 

We love you. We really love you. And, we want to thank you! In addition to oodles of heartfelt appreciation and the satisfaction of knowing that you are making a dream possible (really!), you'll also get perks for your contribution. Check them out and be prepared to be delighted.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We're beyond appreciative for any help we can get in turning this dream into a reality. A few other ways you can be a part of this adventure:

Spread the word through your social networks. Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, email... You can rest assured we'll take good care of any folks you send our way.

Cheer us on! Leave us a comment here and let us know you came by for a visit.

Volunteer your time or talents. As the project progresses we'll need help with stuff like painting, lifting, and the list goes on…

 

We sure hope you can feel the abundance of love and appreciation we're sending your way!

Some Perks have been UPGRADED!


To encourage people to get involved early we have upgraded some perks and added a couple of new ones.  Please note the following free additions!


Champion:
 
If we reach our goal of $10,000 every perk of Champion or above will recieve an additional 100 Hero Points to start their account.
 
Paragon:

The Paragon level perk will now include a life time subscription to one comic (based on a 12 month subscription).

What is in a Premium Membership?

Memberships are good for one year from date of issue and the cost is non-refundable and limited to the owner of the membership and their spouse (and dependants).

 

Membership Coupons- The customer receives 20% off one regular priced item (including tournament fees) four times a year (Jan, Apr, July, Sept). (Coupons cannot be combined with Hero Point sales.) 

 

Comic Reserve perks – all comics from the customer’s pull list are bagged and boarded for them.  In addition all new comics are 10% off.

 

Hero Points – Members build up points as they spend money.  The more you spend the more you save down the road.

1 point per dollar spent.

200 pts = $10 discount

400 pts = $25 discount

700 pts = $50 discount

1000 pts = $100 discount

 

 T-Shirts and Tote Bags:

Here is what the T-shirts and Tote bags will look like.  Check out the Gallary for larger versions.

 

 

 

Extra T-shirt or Tote Bag:

If you would like an additonal T-shirt or Tote bag simply donate an additional $25 to any perk at the Hero level or higher for each extra T-shirt or Bag you want.  Please message us to tell if you want the T-Shirt or Tote bag.

Shipping:

For all perks that will require shipping outside of Saint John, NB please add $10.

story:
Resumen general

En Potterzone somos un grupo de fans hispanohablantes que desarrollamos apps y videojuegos totalmente gratuitos con la temática de Harry Potter desde el año 2011. En estos 5 años hemos creado más de veinte juegos de la saga y hemos estado dándole un servicio constante a los fans de la Saga a través de nuestro portal www.potterzone.net
Pero el día de hoy, queremos llevar nuestras apps a un nuevo nivel haciendo realidad el pedido que cientos de fans vienen realizando desde hace meses: vamos a crear un Harry Potter GO y una app en donde puedas transformar tu dispositivo móvil en una varita mágica. Pero para ello necesitamos tu ayuda.
Gracias a tu colaboración económica podremos solventar todos los gastos necesarios para desarrollar la app de la mejor forma posible.

¿Qué es WIZPROWL?
Wizprowl (www.potterzone.net/wizprowl) es la app HARRY POTTER GO que estamos desarrollando, en donde podrás recorrer el mundo muggle en busca de criaturas mágicas y coleccionar cromos de brujas y magos famosos. Además de realizar misiones de profesores y más. La app está prevista a lanzarse en el 2017 para los sistemas operativos ANDROID e IOS.

¿Qué es POTTERZONE WAND?
Potterzone Wand es la app que te permitirá utilizar tu dispositivo móvil como si fuese una varita mágica. Con esta app podrás aprender a realizar hechizos con movimientos de varita y con tu pronunciación, ademas de brindarte la posibilidad de batirte en un duelo de magos contra otros estudiantes y también jugar a ciertos minijuegos que están disponibles actualmente en Potterzone de una nueva manera.


¿Alguna vez imaginaste vivir la experiencia de ser un mago al igual que lo hacen los personajes de los libros y películas de la saga? ¡Esta es tu oportunidad de volver realidad tu sueño!

 

¿Adonde irá mi colaboración?

En Potterzone utilizaremos tu colaboración para poder mejorar nuestros servidores, que necesitarán ser más eficientes para poder soportar las nuevas aplicaciones, cantidad de datos que se enviarán y recibirán y también para poder darle la bienvenida a cientos de usuarios nuevos.
Por otra parte, tu ayuda también nos podrá permitir realizar todos los pagos necesarios para poder desarrollar nuestras apps para el sistema operativo IOS, ya que en la actualidad nuestras apps únicamente se encuentran disponibles para Android, debido a que desde la organización no contamos con el presupuesto necesario para adquirir las licencias que requiere Apple para desarrollar y publicar apps de su sistema operativo. Esto significaría que nuestras apps llegarían a cientos de dispositivos adicionales, entre los que se encuentran Iphone, Ipad, Ipod, entre otros.
En cuanto a nuestras futuras apps, tu ayuda nos servirá para poder crear todas las criaturas necesarias para la app Wizprowl, así como también pagarle a nuevos programadores que se sumarán a los proyectos en los que venimos trabajando hace unos meses.

 

¿Hay algún reconocimiento por mi colaboración?
Por supuesto que si! Todos los que colaboren se llevaran regalos como agradecimiento. Por favor, asegúrate que al momento de colaborar escribas tus datos correctamente para que podamos contactarte para enviarte tus regalos.

  • Quienes realicen una colaboración de $5 o superior recibirán un colgante del símbolo de Las Reliquias de la Muerte o un giratiempo, igual al que usó Hermione Granger en Harry Potter y el Prisionero de Azkaban.
     
  • Quienes realicen una colaboración de $9 o superior, recibirán una bufanda o gorro de su casa de Hogwarts, igual a las que se ven en las películas de la saga.
     
  • Todos los que colaboren con el proyecto, sin importar de cuánto sea su ayuda, recibirán como regalo una carta de aceptación del Colegio Hogwarts de Magia y Hechicería a su nombre en la cuenta de email con la que hayan realizado la donación.
     

Tu colaboración tiene impacto

Tu ayuda nos permitirá cumplir tu sueño y el de miles de fans de todo el mundo. ¡Por eso eres tan valioso para nosotros y para el resto! Tu colaboración hace que el mundo deje de ser un poco menos muggle ¿Lo has notado?
Aunque no puedas colaborar con dinero, puedes generar impacto en otros fans compartiendo esta campaña en grupos de facebook, sitios web, a tus amigos que son igual de fanáticos que tú... ¡Corre la voz! Y con eso ya nos habrás ayudado mucho más de lo que piensas.
 


Copyright
Potterzone ©2011-2016.
www.potterzone.net


Harry Potter Publishing Rights © J.K. Rowling
Potterzone, su web y apps no están afiliadas con J.K. Rowling ni Warner Bros.
Harry Potter characters, names and related indicia are trademarks of and © Warner Bros. Ent. All Rights Reserved
