story:
Al-Shirkuh has its share of warriors and wise men, clerics and sorcerers, healers and harmers, peasants and nobles, commanders and cowards, and merchants and rogues. This is a land where men and women can choose to walk beside the gods or follow their own path to enlightenment, converse with mighty and capricious jinn or damn them to oblivion, live with the desert or tolerate its presence.

Most have no great destiny. They are born, grow old, and die without ever seeing the many wonders or facing the endless perils the desert has to offer. This is all they will ever know, and in that they are content. Others, though, strive for greatness. Their names may be unknown to storytellers and sages for now, but there will come a time when their deeds will be counted among those of the heroes of old.

This supplement contains 50 characters, both villainous and heroic, ready to be dropped into any Hellfrost: Land of Fire or Arabian Nights-style game or used as player characters.

To make life easy for the reader, each character's statistics, background, description, mannerisms, and image fits on a single page.

Shipping, when applicable, is automatically added when you pledge.

 

  • We're looking to fund a 50-page, 8.5" x 11" softcover, saddle-stitched book.
  • The writing, art, and layout for this book is already complete. We're seeking funding to produce print copies.

Please check out our recommended pledge levels below!

 

We'll be shipping the physical book from either the USA or the EU depending on your location. Shipping costs are as follows:

USA - $9

UK - $5

EU - $9

ROW - $9

 

Triple Ace Games began in 2008. The masterminds behind the company, Paul "Wiggy" Wade-Williams and Robin Elliott, had previously worked on The Savage World of Solomon Kane andSlipstream settings, among others, for Pinnacle Entertainment Group. Triple Ace Games has produced many popular settings, including Hellfrost, Leagues of Adventure, Leagues of Gothic Horror, and All for One: Regime Diabolique, plus the Rocket Race, Cadaver, and Halfling Feast card games. With many years of experience in the games industry, we continue to create fantastic games for everyone.

Risks & Challenges

As we said above, this book is essentially ready to go. The text has been written, added, and laid out, and all the art is in place. Aside from a final cover, which will be produced in-house, this book is ready to go!

 

We have a great deal of experience in the field of games publishing, and we think we can deliver this project without problems.

However, things can go wrong with anything that goes into a manufacturing process. We have identified that delays in manufacturing could happen, so we have allowed additional time in our schedule to enable us to navigate any delay issues. If all goes to plan, we may even be able to deliver the project a little sooner.

We understand the printing process as we have printed a good number of books previous to this project, and we know how to communicate our ideas to the printer. We have discussed proofing requirements, so we know that when the printing press is started our book will match our specification requirements.

With projects like this there is nearly always something that costs more so it is good business sense to have some contingency for this, which we have built in to our costs.

Spread the Word

Even if you're a fan of Hellfrost: Land of Fire, we understand that you might have no interest in this particular book. However, as a fan of company we ask that you help spread the word of this project through social media.

story:
Short Summary

The Winnowing has begun; people everywhere are abandoning the old Gods for the deities of their neighbors, their allies - even their enemies, if they seem strong enough. Prove your right to rule: protect your followers, harbor you resources, and conquer Other Gods.

Other gods is a collectible card game for 2 or more players with a runtime of ~30 minutes. 

Players take on the role of their favorite mythological deity in the waning days of polytheism. With a scant 100 adherents each they must fight to earn their right to exist in the new world - while at the same time edging out their spiritual competitors - by converting or destroying their opponents' followers through the use of might and magic.

The rulebook is available to download in pdf here if you would like to see the rules in full. 


Extensive research was done on all the cards and aspects soas to present an experience as close to the authentic original myths as possible with every card and ability related directly to the source material.

The artists that worked on Other Gods with me were excellent: Here's an interview with lead artist Riccardo Zoppello, an awesome collaborator without whom this game would not exist looking this good at this time: Interview


And here's a small sample of some of the game art:


While the theming has turned out beautifully, and the artists have done an outstanding job; this was a mechanics-first game from the start. Every care was given to build up Other Gods into a game that I believe stands ahead of all other CCGs on the market in terms of fun, engaging, gameplay. 

(You can see my original design statement here. Since its creation and working on the game, I have expanded on it in both breadth and nuance with pages and pages of chicken-scratch notes, cross-outs, and re-writes, but it still serves as a strong template for what Other Gods has set out to do - and I hope you find - has done.) 

With tons of work put into balancing the game appropriately for both this and future sets, you can be assured that Other Gods will retain both its depth and replayability for as long as you play it.

Gameplay footage here.


Our minimum funding goal is £1760/$2500 to do a limited print run of both the Norse and the Sumerian structured decks as well as a large supplementary set including more Norse and Sumerian content, but also including cards from several other mythologies, all of which can be played with the existing structured decks, that will be further explored and expanded in later sets. 

Anything raised above our funding goal will go towards producing and printing further sets. I am intending to stick with the 2 themed structured decks, 1 supplementary set pattern, and am currently I am thinking of choosing 2 of 4 mythologys: Aztec Lords, Arthurian/pre-Arthurian Legends, Chinese Nine Dragons, and Greek Olympians, but one of the funding rewards allows a contributor to choose their own mythology of choice for me to work on, and I will be more than happy to take on whichever set they choose.


Risks in terms of production and shipping should be low; I'm intending to use a well known western printer for all components of the game, and will be shipping using the Royal Mail Service. 

The arrival times on pledges are estimates; however, and although the game is already complete, delays could potentially occur in either production or shipping. Additionally, if you are receiving the game internationally your own postal service may cause delays.

Last but not least I could be set upon by marauding wildlife and be pressed into service by the animals to rule over the jungle, but since I live in the middle of Belfast, and there's no jungles in Ireland, I believe this is a trifling concern.


Thanks for reading, and I hope to you see you at the board soon :)

Stephen Rush

story:
POCKET TACTICS:”illo is a 3D action puzzle game that looks fun, if not groundbreaking..”.

 

EDGE:”A handsome puzzle adventure game for iOS and Android”.

 

PLAY ANDROID MAGAZINE: ”The graphic style is really impressive..”.

 

CAPSULE COMPUTERS: ”Unique, different game”.

 

What is illo?

illo  is the central character of a 3D action puzzle adventure for PC, iOS and Android. Tiny illo is sucked into a baffling gap in the sky, leaving behind its world, its home, its tree. 

The game

You will be plunged together with illo into an uncharted territory governed by dynamics you’ll need to master in order to survive and progress. You’ll witness illo’s premature awakening in the wrong place: an unexplored environment filled with weird and wonderful creatures. The sequence of events is neither modular nor foreseeable: a unique wonderland. You'll need to act quickly, wait patiently, observe, think, discover, transform, lock, blow, rush, fall, swim and much more that we’d love to share with you, but we don't want to spoil your surprise. Your "WOW" is our goal.

Why are we on indiegogo?

We need your help to produce a playable demo of illo birth of the cool to prove how absolutely wonderful and original this game is.Major publishers are asking us for a demo, but this project’s GAMEPLAY, MUSIC and ART are top-quality and much more complex than may seem. That’s why we can’t produce a demo without your funding. Publishers want to try out illo so be a part of our chance to amaze them!

 

theAndroidSoul:”..the game definitely does have a fresh and unique look,.. ..creative interactivity,.. ..intriguing artwork and gameplay..”.

 

gamefanatics:”..illo, one of the cutest ”blobs” you’ll probably ever see..”.

 

BLACKMAN’N ROBIN: ”Fan of pretty, artsy games? You’re going to want to check out illo – birth of the cool. It looks beautiful”.

 

IMAGES here. 

A 2D concept video about some game mechanics here.

A new 2D concept video: "something moves", here.

More PRESS here.

 

Platforms:

illo birth of the cool will first be developed for PC, iOS and Android, then we're going to bring the game on Ouya and Sony, Microsoft and Nintendo systems too. A playable demo can make this possible.

Estimated time frame:

4 Months for the demo (since we get funded), 12 months for the game (since publisher signature), but you will immediately receive the perks along with the playable demo!

1 Why fund illo birth of the cool.

If you, too, think that very few games today are truly entertaining and original and, just like us, you’d want more, help us finance the playable demo of illo birth of the cool and we’ll be able to obtain funds to develop the full game: original and enjoyable as few others. Help us entertain you!

 

PEOPLE:

Luca Eliani is an artist, designer and official actor’s voice of Disney’s Donald Duck in Italy. He created illo in 2006, finished the game in 2011 and presented the project to Massimiliano Di Monda that same year.

 

Raylight CEO Massimiliano Di Monda, Fausto Cardone (lead programmer) and Francesco Paduano (lead artist) work in the Game Industry since 1996. During their 16-year’s career, they produced more than 20 products across numerous platforms. In 2002/2003 Wing Commander Prophecy on the Nintendo GameBoy Advance was named Best Technological Excellence runner up at E3 in Los Angeles. Recent games include the highly acclaimed Sniper Elite for the Nintendo Wii published by Reef-Entertainment, My Little Baby on the Samsung BADA platform (winner of the Samsung Bada developer challenge), I-phone, Wiiware and PC, Deer Hunt Legends for Nintendo 3DS, iOS, Android, PC, Wii, AXL (3D engine development and programming support) for iOS.

Raylight also won acclaim for its technically superb Resident Evil demo on GBA.

We need your help to produce a playable demo of illo birth of the cool to prove how absolutely wonderful and original this game is.Major publishers are asking us for a demo, but this project’s GAMEPLAY, MUSIC and ART are top-quality and much more complex than may seem. That’s why we can’t produce a demo without your funding. Publishers want to try out illo so be a part of our chance to amaze them!
 

theAndroidSoul:”..the game definitely does have a fresh and unique look,.. ..creative interactivity,.. ..intriguing artwork and gameplay..”.
 

gamefanatics:”..illo, one of the cutest ”blobs” you’ll probably ever see..”.
 

BLACKMAN’N ROBIN: ”Fan of pretty, artsy games? You’re going to want to check out illo – birth of the cool. It looks beautiful”.
 
IMAGES here. 
A 2D concept video about some game mechanics here.
A new 2D concept video: "something moves", here.
More PRESS here.
 
Platforms:
illo birth of the cool will first be developed for PC, iOS and Android, then we're going to bring the game on Ouya and Sony, Microsoft and Nintendo systems too. A playable demo can make this possible.
Estimated time frame:
4 Months for the demo (since we get funded), 12 months for the game (since publisher signature), but you will immediately receive the perks along with the playable demo!
1 Why fund illo birth of the cool.
If you, too, think that very few games today are truly entertaining and original and, just like us, you’d want more, help us finance the playable demo of illo birth of the cool and we’ll be able to obtain funds to develop the full game: original and enjoyable as few others. Help us entertain you!
 
PEOPLE:
Luca Eliani is an artist, designer and official actor’s voice of Disney’s Donald Duck in Italy. He created illo in 2006, finished the game in 2011 and presented the project to Massimiliano Di Monda that same year.
 
Raylight CEO Massimiliano Di Monda, Fausto Cardone (lead programmer) and Francesco Paduano (lead artist) work in the Game Industry since 1996. During their 16-year’s career, they produced more than 20 products across numerous platforms. In 2002/2003 Wing Commander Prophecy on the Nintendo GameBoy Advance was named Best Technological Excellence runner up at E3 in Los Angeles. Recent games include the highly acclaimed Sniper Elite for the Nintendo Wii published by Reef-Entertainment, My Little Baby on the Samsung BADA platform (winner of the Samsung Bada developer challenge), I-phone, Wiiware and PC, Deer Hunt Legends for Nintendo 3DS, iOS, Android, PC, Wii, AXL (3D engine development and programming support) for iOS.
Raylight also won acclaim for its technically superb Resident Evil demo on GBA.

story:
Our first demo is ready! Click to play and tell us what you think! all your comments and feedback are greatly appreciated!
Note that this is not the full first world (it's not even close!). It's just a little sample of the game for you to test it and get a better feel for the mechanic and characters!


Flatman is a 2.5D platform and puzzle game. In this game you'll be able to change into 3 different shapes: triangle, circle and square. With these forms you'll have different abilities and ways of solving puzzles and battling your enemies. It's fun to experiment and see what works best on what!


The game is scheduled for release in Spring 2015 for PC and Mac platforms.


        

HOW DO I PLAY THIS?

You have 3 shapes to play as, each one changing the gameplay dramatically!


Use your skills to explore and overcome challenges, experiment and see what happens!


Discover your enemies’ weaknesses, combat in rock, paper, scissors style!


Defeat giant bosses using all your puzzle solving and combat abilities!

Also you acquire  upgrades through the game like the classic double jump.

And other special and unique abilities!

                                                       

THE FORMS

                                                            

As Circle Flatman you'll be very light, meaning your jumps will reach higher places and you can float on water. The circle could be considered the "middle ground" of the three shapes, as it has medium walking speed. With this one you'll be able to defeat the heavy square type enemies, but you'll have to be careful with the triangle ones, they're very sharp, ouch!

                                                            

Triangle Flatman is the speedster. He can run faster than the other two, but you'll have less control over your movement, so watch your step! You'll cover great distances with this form, so take advantage of its speed. As triangle you'll have the power to beat the balloon like circle enemies, but you can be defeated with ease by the strong square type enemies, they're a though bunch!

                                                             

Last but not least, is Square Flatman. This shape is the slowest and heaviest, but also the strongest and sturdiest. He can sink underwater like a rock, and his might is pretty formidable. He's able to push heavy objects and cause great harm. The Square can crush the feeble triangle types, but look out for those circle types, they can make you loose your balance!

By combining the three shapes, you can explore the whole Flat Kingdom and discover all kinds of secrets. After each level you'll acquire different upgrades for new skills! Use them wisely!

The worlds are big and full of secrets and surprises! So you'll have plenty to do and discover while you reach your goal.

                                                       






Our stretch goals include to have awesome full motion videos by Don Porfirio, a game theme composed by Manami Matsumae (you may know her from Mighty Number 9 or Megaman), multiplayer mode and ports to game consoles.


                                                          

The game is still in development. We recently cooked up a demo version and displayed it live in different video game events in our city, where the participants gave us their feedback to improve our game.


Now we are finishing up the first level (The Flat Forest) and polishing a few details to begin the new areas of the game.


We have a long way ahead of us, we know, but we're on the right track and all we need is a little help from you to make this project a reality!

                                                       

OUR TEAM

We are Fat Panda Games, a small and young game studio located in the beautiful state of Yucatán, in México.

The team has all kinds of crazy characters, ranging from our creative director to programmers, concept artists, designers, animators, 3D artists, illustrators and musicians.

If you wanna learn more about us, you can check out our official site.

                                                     

SOUNDTRACK

The soundtrack is made by the audio engineer Rodrigo Buenfil, in his studio Stereolab. Here are some of the tracks of the game



                                                       

PRESS AND MEDIA

                                                         

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Being our first big project as a team, we are facing a lot of new challenges that we must learn to overcome. We are using our skills in animation, illustration, programming and design in this 1 year and a half project.

To be  honest, the videogame industry is not really that serious (not to say non existent) in this little corner of the world (Mérida, Yucatán), so it's though to get local support and investment. This is mainly why we are here, because we want to encourage more indie video game startups in Latin America and in all parts of the world.

We love what we do and we love videogames. We are having fun developing this, so we hope you'll have fun playing it. Our motto is "develop the games we would like to play ourselves".

                                                            

FAQ

When will this game be released?

April 2015.

What game engine are you using?

Unity3D.

Do you have plans to port to other platforms?

Yes, one of the stretch goals is a port to tablets. We're currently making arrangements for console versions (would be a dream come true!) and thinking about a mobile version (for smartphones).

Is it safe to donate?

Absolutely, Indiegogo keeps your information safe, and makes sure your money arrives without any kinds of problems or extra fees.

Is it difficult to donate?

Not at all, it's just as easy as choosing one of the rewards at the right of the screen, putting your receipt information and select the method of payment.

In what stage of development are you?

We have a beta prototype, some of the game design and animation, documentation, 3D assets and music. We are assembling the first stage and developing the rest of the game. Approximately 15% of development is complete, but we need your help to do this!

How will my pledge be distributed?

  • 7% Fees (Indiegogo and transference fees)
  • 15% development of the rewards for backers (Merchandise rewards)
  • 40% art & music development (To make the best game for you)
  • 35% programming (Good programmers are hard to find and expensive)
  • 3% software licenses, etc. (Unity Publication fees)

What kind of upgrades is Flatman getting?

Some of them are the good ol' flatforming classics (double jumping, stomping, pushing larger objects) but a good chunk are innovative and clever techniques that allow Flatman to do some crazy stuff! You'll love it!

How many stages are in the game?

So far, there are 6 levels in the work (each one being pretty big and full of secrets, with at least two bosses). But some of our stretch goals include an extra chapter and a whole new level!

I still have questions, can I contact you?
    Of course! We'll gladly answer all of your questions and read your feedback at contacto@fatpanda.tv
    How can I find you in social media?
    Facebook     Twitter   Youtube

    Do you have a website?

    Yes, www.flatmanthegame.com, there you can find more information about Flatman.

    GAME REVIEWS


    REWARDS

    White Flat T Shirts!

    Black Flat T Shirts!

story:
Who Are We?

CodeSkeleton is a French start-up company based near Paris.

CodeSkeleton aims to provide incredible products and solutions for the web and mobile worlds.

My name is Yassine Zaroui, Software Engineer and Entrepreneur, founder of CodeSkeleton and main developer of Fruity Rain.


Fruity Rain is our very first game project for mobile devices, 100% developed in-house, graphics included.

Fruity Rain is a real, funny and challenging game with original graphics, design and gameplay. 

For us, it is more than just a game. It is a proof of concept that will help us validate our company project and launch our start-up.

What is Fruity Rain game?


Fruity Rain is an original new casual game, suitable for all ages but intended for 5 to 12 years children.

Before the campaign

Fruity Rain is a catch-those-falling-objects game. What makes the big difference with other similar games, is that with Fruity Rain, caught fruits remain in the basket and the challenge is to maximize the score while making sure to get the required fruits.

Give it a try : 15 levels are already available for free on Google Play.

After the campaign

With the primary goal of 3000 € reached, the game will be available on Android and iOS with 45 additional levels, plus powerups and harming items. 

You'll have to catch the fruits and the bonus items, while avoiding dangerous items (insects, bombs, rocks, ...).

What We Need & What You Get

Developing games is a tough and costly task. 

Even the simplest 2D games will require hiring artists, programmers, designers and so on.

For Fruity Rain, we decided to leave our full time jobs and get out of our comfort zone to devote ourselves fully to make this game from scratch. Every pixel, and every line of code is made by us.

Every donated cent (after paying the campaign expenses) will go exclusively toward the development of Fruity Rain and to feed us while in hard labor.

Our goal of 3 000 € will enable us to:

  • Make the game more enjoyable and challenging by adding the bonus and harming items features.
  • Make the game more surprising by 45 original additional levels with new graphics.
  • Make the game available to a larger audience by releasing it to iOS devices.
If we don't reach this goal, the features will still be added but will take much more time. The raised funds will be used to complete the current version of the game.

Stretch goal #1 of 5 000 € will enable us to  :

  • Perform all the tasks mentioned above, plus
  • Release the game to Windows Phone.
  • Release the game to BlackBerry.
The additional money will be used to buy equipment for development and testing.

Stretch goal #2 of 10 000 € will enable us to  :

  • Perform all the tasks mentioned above, plus
  • Add a new game mode : Infinity, where you have to get the highest possible score before running out of juice (blood) .
  • Add a new game mode : Puzzle, where you have to route the fruits to the correct basket.

Stretch goal #3 of 20 000 € will enable us to  :

  • Perform all the tasks mentioned above, plus
  • Add Retina graphics and design updates.
  • Add Social Networks support to publish accomplishments.
  • Add online back-end leader board. 

What you will get for being part of the Fruity Rain game project:

All contributors will be rewarded with many perks that range from a big thank you to a 5-days vacation training in a waterfront villa in Tunisia.
Take a look at the right column to see the details of what you can get.

The Impact

You may have noticed the huge amount of game clones that dirties the mobile world with ugly graphics and poor overall quality.

We are against those practices of skinning games and releasing them as new products.

Fruity Rain is a simple game but it is an original product, with dedicated in-house hight quality graphics and design.

Fruity Rain is fun and a bit addictive, but not too much. It will teach your children to count and to recognize fruits while playing.

Your contribution will help us improve it even more and maybe create derivative apps and games that teach children letters, numbers, colors and more...

Risks & Challenges

As you already know, making games is difficult and time-consuming. Furthermore, I am creating my company CodeSkeleton while developing Fruity Rain which in turn requires lot of time and effort.

This is my big challenge, but since I am used to work long hours and under stress, the risks are minimal. At worst, we may be a week or so behind the scheduled release dates.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't help, you still can...

Spread the good word around you,

Like and share the Fruity Rain's Facebook and Google+ pages,

Tweet about the game,

Download the Android Lite version and add a good review,

Talk about the game and link to it on you website and on social networks.

story:
The World's Greatest Game Ever Story

MWG's mission is to educate, entertain and help enrich the people of the world by simply providing businesses with a productive way to give back to the communities that made them what they are. Help us establish a better way to advertise to the people of the world. We intend to do this by broadcasting MWG gamerounds at least 12 times a day everyday to the UK via the Internet to start. Our unique mobile multimedia "game pieces" called SmartDarts are the main keys to winning the MWG gamerounds and we'll be distributing SmartDarts free beginning 30 days before the launch date of 1 December 2012.

Sports, Music, Movies, Science & Technology relative to the United Kingdom's culture are the categories that we're converting to SmartDarts right now. The USA is next up.

Starting from the moment we post this on Indiegogo we will be doing our best to line up sponsors that are willing to participate in our groundbreaking mobile advertising platform by providing cash awards for the winners of the gamerounds. We've already put some feelers out and crunched the numbers for a few potential major sponsors and the interest is high as our new system is the first of its kind and is absolutely the best way under the sun to reach mobile device users!

This is where YOU come in - if the United Kingdom's community of mobile device users unite in flexing their mobile muscles, the advertisers will listen much sooner than later. 

You can weigh in now by simply pre-registering to play right now and also have all of your friends and family do the same. It's free to play and it takes less than one minute to register.

How to Play

An MWG gameround will be broadcast live 12 times a day on the Internet to start and you play from your mobile device by texting the correct answers (a seven digit number) at the end of each gameround. You must get 7 out of 7 answers correct and be among the first 10 to win (10 winners each round). While MWG does not charge anything or make anything from the texting, and it is free to play the game, your carrier may charge you for texting. Many smartphone users can also see the MWG gamerounds live right from their mobile device!

The UK launch goal includes the creation of 2,500 new multimedia SmartDarts and a 30 day supply of multimedia MWG gamerounds for the UK. Our proprietary system processes the answers to each gameround publically and in real time (instant gratification) and then ranks the answers for accuracy and time stamp. You will be challenged in a unique and entertaining way while having fun and spreading wisdom at the same time right from your mobile device because our "game pieces" are multimedia messages that you may share right from your mobile device. Although the gameround schedule will be public, the raw data, rankings and other information are only available to registered users. Register today and ask your family and friends to do the same!

If we are unable to find sponsors by the launch date, we will still broadcast the MWG gamerounds, rank the winners and basically you will be playing for fun and braggng rights. We will do this for as long as we're able to without sponsors.

If we are short of our goal here on Indiegogo we will create the multimedia content accordingly which will have a bearing on how many gamerounds we can broadcast daily.

Either way, all perks will be fulfilled! 

About SmartDarts

Smartdarts are multimedia packets of human knowledge (as opposed to alien knowledge which may follow later). What if someone dedicated the time and energy to find, catalog and convert the facts of life everywhere into short videos that included over 5,000 awesome licensed music tracks of many genres, awesome animations and graphics and they made it so these multimedia packets of knowledge could be easily shared via mobile devices anywhere in the world?

This is what MWG is doing right now. Actually, we have been doing this under the radar for years and now that we have nailed the smartdart processes, we need your help to replicate production for the gradual country by country, project by project launch. Backers will be helping us produce this multimedia content in time for the launch. MWG gamerounds & resultsrounds also consist of SmartDarts and even more multimedia!

About "factors"

  • The regular definition of factor means something or someone that made a difference in an outcome. We extend that definition for our applications to include; a person that gathers the facts of the world for another's use and a person that delivers those facts to others by way of presentation.
  • So, here at MWG we have "text factors" and we have "video factors" that we think of as - one who makes a difference by promoting the spreading of knowledge while having fun.
  • Become a factor & make a difference - real people SmartDarts!

We Innovate for the Community

MWG has an eye on the future. We make games that are not only fun, but also productive in the real world. These are games that will offer all folks an equal opportunity to be included within the economic loop whenever possible throughout each day!

Consider this: what if a part of the zillions of dollars spent on ad campaigns and media spots to get the public's attention were instead re-directed to providing rewards and incentives directly to the public via MWG gamerounds in an attempt to get the public's attention?  People deserve this opportunity to change the game!

About MWG GameRounds

Initially we will broadcast MWG gamerounds 12 times a day and each MWG gameround is preceded by the results of the previous round for a total of 6 minutes. As the game gains popularity, we are able to increase the frequency of broadcasts as needed. As the game increases in popularity, the goal is to have all kinds of businesses take notice of the advertising opportunities and begin to vigorously participate via more & more sponsorship of MWG gamerounds. Remember, the sponsors will be the ones deciding and providing the awards and also the terms that go with each MWG gameround. Our proprietary program aptly facilitates these transactions and we're also the producers of the content. If we do not find sponsors to furnish the cash awards by 1 December 2012, the UK games will still begin, but without the cash awards. Register today. It's free!

It is the community that has the REAL POWER in the marketplace to make these improvements actually happen. A successful launch will show other businesses that this will absolutely be a win win situation.  
Register today and ask your family and friends to do the same!

About Sponsors

Advertising makes the world go around. But things are changing very quickly these days because we're all getting a lot smarter about the way we do things. We don't believe that old shotgun blast method of advertising is going to work for mobile users of the world. Even the industry admits that a lot of that advertising is not effective yet, and no one has really figured mobile out - that is until you just did.....

  • The smarter community today knows that people of the world have a much stronger voice than ever thanks to advances in technology.
  • The smarter community knows that there are better ways to get stuff done now.
  • The smarter community knows that if businesses need the community, then the community can motivate businesses to help find better ways to circulate dollars within the community beyond charity.
  • The smarter sponsors and advertisers will now know that the smarter community is very aware of their new found powers and that smarter advertiser will now make the necessary adjustments to effectively reach the smarter community.

The smarter community knows that when this game launches successfully, this game will be known as the world's greatest game ever!

About Free Registration

Our goal is 1 million United Kingdom registrations before 1 December 2012! Your backing is greatly appreciated but another very important ingredient needed for a successful launch is for everyone to register to play! It takes less than one minute to register and we will never sell or distribute this information without your permission. Your registration is the prime reason sponsors will want to provide the rewards for the games. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word and also register today. This is what will draw in the sponsors. It's easy & it is free!

More Power to the People

As you've probably already noticed by now, this is way beyond a game - this is a new system that enables businesses to get their messages to the people in a mutually productive way. Think about the previously dominant advertising models that made businesses go to advertising agencies and conventional media companies to get their messages to consumers. While that model has been highly successful, thanks to mobile technology, there are new and better ways to get messages to consumers.

Consider this: what if a part of the zillions of dollars spent on ad campaigns and media spots to get the people's attention were instead re-directed to providing cash awards directly to the people via MWG gamerounds in an attempt to get the people's attention? People deserve this opportunity to change the game!  (yes, we had to say it twice)

Transparency

Right out the gate, Mobile Wisdom Games LLC announced and published the fact that a minimum 50% of MWG’s net profits will always go back to the communities supporting the new MWG model via MWG sponsored gamerounds. See the press release here.

Also, built into our system is the ability for registered users to see clearly how well other businesses are supporting the communities that support them. Needless to say, (but we're saying it anyway), this can be a very powerful tool for the people of the world!

About Perks for Backers

All perks will be fulfilled!
Sports, Music, Movies, Science & Technology are the categories that we are converting to SmartDarts right now.

As a backer, (first three levels) you may choose from any of those categories for fulfillment of your reward.

As a backer and video factor, (three levels) you may also choose from those same categories in deciding which subject you will "factor". We'll send you verified facts from that category and you webcam yourself in a YouTube like manner (we''ll include simple instructions) and email it in to us. We then add music and graphics typical to our animated SmartDarts and send it back to you for your circulation. We do NOT place ads or names on real people SmartDarts! A video/image release is required.

As a backer, video factor & MWG resultsround host, (three levels) you may also choose from those same categories in deciding which subject you will "factor" and also "host". Host means that you will webcam yourself reciting a script that we provide in a YouTube like manner. We then add music and graphics typical to our animated resultsround hosts. We will provide simple instructions. Although we do not place ads or names on real people SmartDarts, you'll have an option to use your name as a resultsround host and due to the sponsor relationship in an MWG gameround, ads MAY be included. A video/image release is required.

As a backer, video factor, resultsround host & MWG gameround host, (three levels) you may also choose from those same categories in deciding which subject you will "factor" and also "host". Host means that you will webcam yourself recitng a script that we provide in a YouTube like manner. We then add music and graphics typical to our animated gameround hosts. We will provide simple instructions. Although we do not place ads or names on real people SmartDarts, you'll have an option to use your name as a gameround & results host and due to the sponsor relationship in an MWG gameround & results presentation, ads MAY be included. A video/image release is required.

About MWG Projects

MWG is a multimedia producer and mobile game creator. We intend to launch our world games first in every country that has mobile device users and Internet download speeds of over 10,000 kbps. This means we need to create a substantial amount of content based upon that country's culture and in that country's language. We actually luv doing this! We're a creative bunch of folks looking for more creative souls to help us keep this going. So, we'll be utilizing the creative services of folks everywhere. Each country launch represents a project and so, each project may be a country launch. Sometimes we may group a few smaller countries together in a project. The USA is next up!  VOID WHERE PROHIBITED 

About the President & Founder of MWG

At age 24, Ashley Danielle Davis is the President and co-founder of Mobile Wisdom Games LLC. Ashley's interest in creative and productive ways to promote social well being for people all over the world resulted in a Bachelor of Arts Degree in Sociology from ASU.

MoFact Max is Ashley's crazy dad and the founder of Mobile Wisdom Games LLC. After putting forth a lifetime of hard work, perseverance and discovery, these days all Max wants to do is play golf and smoke fake cigars, WTF!

You can find more information about Ashley, Max and other team members by visiting their facebook pages. 

Thanks for your considerations. Let the games begin! (the USA is next up!)

Please do not hesitate to contact us for more information.
story_txt:
The World's Greatest Game Ever Story
MWG's mission is to educate, entertain and help enrich the people of the world by simply providing businesses with a productive way to give back to the communities that made them what they are. Help us establish a better way to advertise to the people of the world. We intend to do this by broadcasting MWG gamerounds at least 12 times a day everyday to the UK via the Internet to start. Our unique mobile multimedia "game pieces" called SmartDarts are the main keys to winning the MWG gamerounds and we'll be distributing SmartDarts free beginning 30 days before the launch date of 1 December 2012.
Sports, Music, Movies, Science & Technology relative to the United Kingdom's culture are the categories that we're converting to SmartDarts right now. The USA is next up.
Starting from the moment we post this on Indiegogo we will be doing our best to line up sponsors that are willing to participate in our groundbreaking mobile advertising platform by providing cash awards for the winners of the gamerounds. We've already put some feelers out and crunched the numbers for a few potential major sponsors and the interest is high as our new system is the first of its kind and is absolutely the best way under the sun to reach mobile device users!
This is where YOU come in - if the United Kingdom's community of mobile device users unite in flexing their mobile muscles, the advertisers will listen much sooner than later. 
You can weigh in now by simply pre-registering to play right now and also have all of your friends and family do the same. It's free to play and it takes less than one minute to register.
How to Play
An MWG gameround will be broadcast live 12 times a day on the Internet to start and you play from your mobile device by texting the correct answers (a seven digit number) at the end of each gameround. You must get 7 out of 7 answers correct and be among the first 10 to win (10 winners each round). While MWG does not charge anything or make anything from the texting, and it is free to play the game, your carrier may charge you for texting. Many smartphone users can also see the MWG gamerounds live right from their mobile device!
The UK launch goal includes the creation of 2,500 new multimedia SmartDarts and a 30 day supply of multimedia MWG gamerounds for the UK. Our proprietary system processes the answers to each gameround publically and in real time (instant gratification) and then ranks the answers for accuracy and time stamp. You will be challenged in a unique and entertaining way while having fun and spreading wisdom at the same time right from your mobile device because our "game pieces" are multimedia messages that you may share right from your mobile device. Although the gameround schedule will be public, the raw data, rankings and other information are only available to registered users. Register today and ask your family and friends to do the same!
If we are unable to find sponsors by the launch date, we will still broadcast the MWG gamerounds, rank the winners and basically you will be playing for fun and braggng rights. We will do this for as long as we're able to without sponsors.
If we are short of our goal here on Indiegogo we will create the multimedia content accordingly which will have a bearing on how many gamerounds we can broadcast daily.
Either way, all perks will be fulfilled! 
About SmartDarts
Smartdarts are multimedia packets of human knowledge (as opposed to alien knowledge which may follow later). What if someone dedicated the time and energy to find, catalog and convert the facts of life everywhere into short videos that included over 5,000 awesome licensed music tracks of many genres, awesome animations and graphics and they made it so these multimedia packets of knowledge could be easily shared via mobile devices anywhere in the world?
This is what MWG is doing right now. Actually, we have been doing this under the radar for years and now that we have nailed the smartdart processes, we need your help to replicate production for the gradual country by country, project by project launch. Backers will be helping us produce this multimedia content in time for the launch. MWG gamerounds & resultsrounds also consist of SmartDarts and even more multimedia!

About "factors"


The regular definition of factor means something or someone that made a difference in an outcome. We extend that definition for our applications to include; a person that gathers the facts of the world for another's use and a person that delivers those facts to others by way of presentation.
So, here at MWG we have "text factors" and we have "video factors" that we think of as - one who makes a difference by promoting the spreading of knowledge while having fun.

 Become a factor & make a difference - real people SmartDarts!

We Innovate for the Community

story:
What We're About

Our aim is to start a facility called "The Proving Grounds". This facility will be tailor-made for people who want to train in martial arts, and will also be home to the one and only Melee Combat Games.

The Proving Grounds

The Proving Grounds is a concept that we've had in our heads for years—a facility for martial artists where they can come and train at their convenience, where the house has the gear they need, no matter the style. We want to build a hub for martial arts enthusiasts of all stripes.

Our goal for the training side of the building is to allow for two things:

1) A safe and well-equipped environment for drop-in training.

2) A space for instructors to run their own martial arts classes.

We'd like Proving Grounds to host teachers of various styles and to help promote all forms of martial arts. This will give people access to far more resources in one place than they're likely to find anywhere else.

We already have 1 regular class signed up to be run out of our facility, and we foresee many more joining soon!

*Update*
Thanks to the campaign getting out there, we've been contacted and have 2 more regular classes being discussed for the facility!

Melee Combat Games

The other section in the facility will be for Melee Combat Games. Melee Combat Games is close to what you'd get if you took the guns out of paintball and replaced them with swords. We play classic games such as capture the flag and team deathmatch but rather than using C02 powered guns, we're using swords and shields, spears, bows and arrows, and a large variety of other slashy, stabby and smashy melee weapons.

The History

Melee Combat Games started on Vancouver Island in February of 2014. The concept came out of an airsoft game that turned into a sword fight and quickly became its own entity. Many of our members have come from a martial arts background and enjoy the chance to test out what they've learned in their schools.

The Weapons

 


All the weapons we use are specially made by a company out of Quebec called Calimacil, which is the worlds top manufacturer of replica padded weapons. Starting in 2004, they quickly rose to become a world renowned name in Live Action Role Playing, and historical re-enactment.

They make their weapons by wrapping a fiberglass or carbon core with Kevlar, and then pressing the materiel with a tear, puncture and weather resistant, high impact foam.

The weapons have been thoroughly stress tested, and have proven time and time again to be of the highest quality we could ask for.

Melee Combat Games takes safety as a very serious concern. Along with our foam weapons, we provide our players with carbon steel mesh masks for head and face protection.

 

As well as the more traditional games we mentioned already, we also host larger events. This summer we ran a day-long “Hunger Games” event with several tournaments, a campout and BBQ. We’re looking forward to holding more special events throughout the year.

 

We created Melee Combat Games to change up the normal run and gun of paintball and airsoft. With the inclusion of a range of weapons like spears, bows and arrows, shields, and throwing axes, you end up having a different game every time. What works against one weapon may work terribly against another. Shields are great for stopping archers from doing their thing, but polearms can thrust around barriers with ease. With different weapons and different tactics you never have the same game twice, and that's just the way we like it!

About us

This group of ours started because we all shared a common trait: we all genuinely enjoy what we're doing. We're martial artists. We're gamers. We're thrill seekers. From the beginning we've been trying to come up with new and innovative ways to engage people. From our roots in airsoft, to creating this dream of ours we've been directly in it the whole way. We play every game, we test every variable, and we design it to be a new experience for people to get involved in. Our goal with this isn't to create something that will become repetitive, but to grow with the community and constantly have people wanting to come back again and again to see what they'll get to do next. 

For up-to-date information about local activities, make sure you like our Facebook page.

If this is something you want to see get going in the Greater Vancouver Area, and you don't have the money to contribute then remember to spread the word to everyone you know! The more people that hear about this, the more likely it is that it'll happen. Thank you in advance to everyone that contributes to make this happen. I look forward to seeing you all on the battlefield!

story:
Have you ever tried to solve the Rubik’s Cube? There are millions of different combinations and moves you can make, but if you do not know the right pattern of moves, you will never solve the puzzle. This was the inspiration for the Smart E-Cube.







LEARN TO CONQUER THE RUBIX CUBE PUZZLE

With the use of modern technology we were able to build a device that will guide, teach, and help you solve the Rubik's Cube. In the Prompt Operation, you can either record your moves when scrambling the Smart E-Cube and it will guide you back, or it can calculate its current status and prompt you to a finished puzzle. With the Recording Operation, the Smart E-Cube can give you the time it takes and also the process used to solve the puzzle.




 

NON-TRADITIONAL GAME MODES

There are two game modes: Light Challenge and Switch Lights. You can challenge your friends and family to see who can complete the puzzle the quickest!

MORE THAN A PUZZLE

The Smart E-Cube is able to share your experiences with your friends and family through the social functionality on the app. In the future, we hope to open the API and provide you with even more creative ways to play with the Smart E-Cube.

MASTER THE CUBE!





PROMPT OPERATION

Take a look at a scrambled Rubik's Cube. Daunting right? Where do you start? When it comes to learning the complexities of the puzzle, Smart E-Cube can serve as a guide. The Prompt Operation uses easy-to-follow lights and sounds to guide the next action, ultimately leading to a complete puzzle. There are two Prompt Operation settings to choose from: Calculate Restore and Record Restore.

Calculate Restore – Activate this feature when the Smart E-Cube is in a scrambled state. It will guide you with lights and sounds to solve the puzzle. This process calculates the fastest recovery, the shortest steps, and other algorithms - all in a matter of seconds!

Record Restore – When the puzzle is solved, activate this feature, then scramble the puzzle. The Record Restore feature will record your moves when scrambling the Smart E-Cube and will guide you back to the solved puzzle.

Watch how the Prompt Operation works here:

RECORDING OPERATION

Once you know the basics, it’s time to get faster and smarter! Smart E-Cube can record your time and progress through the application.

Recording Time - Challenge yourself by beating your personal records. The Smart E-Cube can record time from start to finish. The internal sensor can automatically start and stop the timer, allowing the player to focus on solving the puzzle as quickly as possible.

Recording Process - Get better and more efficient with your moves every day. The Smart E-Cube utilizes the SpeedStack system that can track the various ways the puzzle is changed within the hand, leaves the contact of the hand, and start and stop times. Even the most experienced Rubik's Cube players make mistakes – See those errors and get better every day! Recording the process has also been proven to help skilled players visualize steps as they solve the puzzle.

SpeedStack is not necessary for training. The internal sensor can automatically determine your start and stop times.

Watch how the Recording Operation works here:

VARIETY OF GAMES

Smart E-Cube also comes with a few non-traditional Rubik's Cube games, including the Light Challenge and Switch Lights.

Light Challenge - Solve the puzzle by eliminating all the illuminated lights! This simple and fun game tests your sense of space and agility and can be played with up to two people. As lights illuminate on the Smart E-Cube, you will be given a limited amount of time to shuffle the cube and turn off the light. Compete with friends to see how many lights you can turn off before the clock runs out!

Watch how the Light Challenge Game works here:

 


 

Switch Lights - A more challenging game, Switch Lights will prompt a single light and the player must move the corner square through the light. Collect the highest number of lights before the timer runs out!

Watch how the Switch Lights Game works here:

MORE THAN A PUZZLE

Smart E-Cube can connect with your friends via the social application. In the future, we hope to open the API and provide you with even more creative ways to play with the Smart E-Cube.

Watch all the Smart E-Cube Games here:

SOCIAL SHARING

The world is full of people that love the challenge of the Rubik's Cube, but they aren't always able to communicate or share this experience with others. Given the advances in the social networking, you can share your achievements with friends everywhere! Choose to compete, study or play together. Challenge each other to get better everyday!

Smart E-Cube is available as two versions: Standard and Full. The chart above lists the included features for each version, with full descriptions of the features listed below.

LIGHT PROMPTING

Each cube cell has LED lights that will correspond with your movement. The lighting will help guide you through each step of the puzzle, ultimately solving the puzzle. If a wrong move is made, the lights will notify you to correct the movement.

SOUND PROMPTING

The Smart E-Cube has an embedded speaker to help guide through the puzzle. Use the voice of the Smart E-Cube to determine whether the rotation is complete or if there are additional moves that you need to make to solve the puzzle.

ROTATION OPERATION MODULE

Smart E-Cube has six rotation detection connections that correspond to the six surfaces of the cube. All data is tracked in real-time and picks up on the stable movement and rotation of each side to correctly prompt the next step in the puzzle.


 

iOS AND ANDROID APP INTEGRATION

Connect Smart E-Cube with your iOS or Android smartphones via Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). Track all data and game scores to see your progress, where you can improve, and challenge your friends!

System Requirements:

iOS ≧ 6
Android ≧ 4.3

BUTTON MODULE

Smart E-Cube has six function buttons all located on the center block. Functions include power, game switching, and mode selection.




 

GYRO DETECT - Only on Smart E-Cube Full Version

The 9-Axis Motion Sensor enables the prompting of the next move to ultimately lead to a solved puzzle, as well as allows to play motion sensing games.

HOME MAGNETIC - Only on Smart E-Cube Full Version

Although the Smart E-Cube LOOKS different from the traditional Rubik's Cube, it FEELS the same. The Smart E-Cube Full Version has a Home Magnet integration to each 90-degree position, providing the “snap” feeling you get with a traditional Rubik's Cube. Knowing when you’ve made a complete move is essential when learning how to quickly solve the puzzle.



As the name suggests, the Smart “Electronic” Cube incorporates high-quality electronic technology, elevating the traditional Rubik's Cube game into something more. Multiple electronic chips, circuits, various sensors, and batteries are all embedded in the 63 × 63 × 63cm cube space. Smart E-Cube uses a total of 122 structural components and nearly 1000 electronic modules.

BLUETOOTH CAPABILITY - Connect to any smart phone through the integrated Bluetooth system.

POWER SUPPLY - USB and wireless charging technology is included on the Smart E-Cube. It takes about one hour for a full charge, and battery life lasts about 2 to 3 months when on standby mode! However, Smart E-Cube can still work as a traditional Rubik's Cube without any battery. The fun doesn’t stop when you run out of power!

 

SMART E-CUBE TIMELINE



Thank you for checking out our Smart E-Cube Indiegogo Campaign! Make sure to follow Smart E-Cube on Facebook. Share our campaign on social media to help spread the news!
story_txt: Have you ever tried to solve the Rubik’s Cube? There are millions of different combinations and moves you can make, but if you do not know the right pattern of moves, you will never solve the puzzle. This was the inspiration for the Smart E-Cube.LEARN TO CONQUER THE RUBIX CUBE PUZZLEWith the use of modern technology we were able to build a device that will guide, teach, and help you solve the Rubik's Cube. In the Prompt Operation, you can either record your moves when scrambling the Smart E-Cube and it will guide you back, or it can calculate its current status and prompt you to a finished puzzle. With the Recording Operation, the Smart E-Cube can give you the time it takes and also the process used to solve the puzzle. NON-TRADITIONAL GAME MODESThere are two game modes: Light Challenge and Switch Lights. You can challenge your friends and family to see who can complete the puzzle the quickest!MORE THAN A PUZZLEThe Smart E-Cube is able to share your experiences with your friends and family through the social functionality on the app. In the future, we hope to open the API and provide you with even more creative ways to play with the Smart E-Cube.MASTER THE CUBE!PROMPT OPERATIONTake a look at a scrambled Rubik's Cube. Daunting right? Where do you start? When it comes to learning the complexities of the puzzle, Smart E-Cube can serve as a guide. The Prompt Operation uses easy-to-follow lights and sounds to guide the next action, ultimately leading to a complete puzzle. There are two Prompt Operation settings to choose from: Calculate Restore and Record Restore.Calculate Restore – Activate this feature when the Smart E-Cube is in a scrambled state. It will guide you with lights and sounds to solve the puzzle. This process calculates the fastest recovery, the shortest steps, and other algorithms - all in a matter of seconds!Record Restore – When the puzzle is solved, activate this feature, then scramble the puzzle. The Record Restore feature will record your moves when scrambling the Smart E-Cube and will guide you back to the solved puzzle.Watch how the Prompt Operation works here:RECORDING OPERATIONOnce you know the basics, it’s time to get faster and smarter! Smart E-Cube can record your time and progress through the application.Recording Time - Challenge yourself by beating your personal records. The Smart E-Cube can record time from start to finish. The internal sensor can automatically start and stop the timer, allowing the player to focus on solving the puzzle as quickly as possible.Recording Process - Get better and more efficient with your moves every day. The Smart E-Cube utilizes the SpeedStack system that can track the various ways the puzzle is changed within the hand, leaves the contact of the hand, and start and stop times. Even the most experienced Rubik's Cube players make mistakes – See those errors and get better every day! Recording the process has also been proven to help skilled players visualize steps as they solve the puzzle.SpeedStack is not necessary for training. The internal sensor can automatically determine your start and stop times.Watch how the Recording Operation works here:VARIETY OF GAMESSmart E-Cube also comes with a few non-traditional Rubik's Cube games, including the Light Challenge and Switch Lights.Light Challenge - Solve the puzzle by eliminating all the illuminated lights! This simple and fun game tests your sense of space and agility and can be played with up to two people. As lights illuminate on the Smart E-Cube, you will be given a limited amount of time to shuffle the cube and turn off the light. Compete with friends to see how many lights you can turn off before the clock runs out!Watch how the Light Challenge Game works here:  Switch Lights - A more challenging game, Switch Lights will prompt a single light and the player must move the corner square through the light. Collect the highest number of lights before the timer runs out!Watch how the Switch Lights Game works here:MORE THAN A PUZZLESmart E-Cube can connect with your friends via the social application. In the future, we hope to open the API and provide you with even more creative ways to play with the Smart E-Cube.Watch all the Smart E-Cube Games here:SOCIAL SHARINGThe world is full of people that love the challenge of the Rubik's Cube, but they aren't always able to communicate or share this experience with others. Given the advances in the social networking, you can share your achievements with friends everywhere! Choose to compete, study or play together. Challenge each other to get better everyday!Smart E-Cube is available as two versions: Standard and Full. The chart above lists the included features for each version, with full descriptions of the features listed below.LIGHT PROMPTINGEach cube cell has LED lights that will correspond with your movement. The lighting will help guide you through each step of the puzzle, ultimately solving the puzzle. If a wrong move is made, the lights will notify you to correct the movement.SOUND PROMPTINGThe Smart E-Cube has an embedded speaker to help guide through the puzzle. Use the voice of the Smart E-Cube to determine whether the rotation is complete or if there are additional moves that you need to make to solve the puzzle.ROTATION OPERATION MODULESmart E-Cube has six rotation detection connections that correspond to the six surfaces of the cube. All data is tracked in real-time and picks up on the stable movement and rotation of each side to correctly prompt the next step in the puzzle. iOS AND ANDROID APP INTEGRATIONConnect Smart E-Cube with your iOS or Android smartphones via Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). Track all data and game scores to see your progress, where you can improve, and challenge your friends!System Requirements:iOS ≧ 6Android ≧ 4.3BUTTON MODULESmart E-Cube has six function buttons all located on the center block. Functions include power, game switching, and mode selection. GYRO DETECT - Only on Smart E-Cube Full VersionThe 9-Axis Motion Sensor enables the prompting of the next move to ultimately lead to a solved puzzle, as well as allows to play motion sensing games.HOME MAGNETIC - Only on Smart E-Cube Full VersionAlthough the Smart E-Cube LOOKS different from the traditional Rubik's Cube, it FEELS the same. The Smart E-Cube Full Version has a Home Magnet integration to each 90-degree position, providing the “snap” feeling you get with a traditional Rubik's Cube. Knowing when you’ve made a complete move is essential when learning how to quickly solve the puzzle.As the name suggests, the Smart “Electronic” Cube incorporates high-quality electronic technology, elevating the traditional Rubik's Cube game into something more. Multiple electronic chips, circuits, various sensors, and batteries are all embedded in the 63 × 63 × 63cm cube space. Smart E-Cube uses a total of 122 structural components and nearly 1000 electronic modules.BLUETOOTH CAPABILITY - Connect to any smart phone through the integrated Bluetooth system.POWER SUPPLY - USB and wireless charging technology is included on the Smart E-Cube. It takes about one hour for a full charge, and battery life lasts about 2 to 3 months when on standby mode! However, Smart E-Cube can still work as a traditional Rubik's Cube without any battery. The fun doesn’t stop when you run out of power! SMART E-CUBE TIMELINEThank you for checking out our Smart E-Cube Indiegogo Campaign! Make sure to follow Smart E-Cube on Facebook. story:
If you would like to get a full preview of Game pad in action, click on the video above and enjoy. Also If you can share it with your friends and family, help spread the word about Game pad on Facebook & Twitter... thank you

The idea of Game pad.

It's all started when my son playing his game and losing all the time with a flat button so that's when the idea of Game pad was born,


I have worked on designing Game pad and building prototypes, during this time I have had dozens of prototypes by 3D printing, tweaking the design numerous times to produce something I'am proud of.


 Now you can enjoy to play all GBA games with Game pad on your iPhone 5, 5c, 5s, iPod touch 5th Gen and iPad mini.

The iPhone, iPod touch or iPad mini game controller you always wanted. Whether in the air, on the road, or between classes, Game pad opens a new world of mobile gaming with style controls. 

STYLE CONTROLS.

Precise console-style analogue controls to dominate your favourite GBA games more easily than using on-screen controls.

Game pad it's lightweight, slim goes with you anywhere. The shape of Game pad fits easily into your pocket, bag, or backpack. Games are always within easy reach.


COMFORTABLE DESIGN.

Game pad is designed for more than casual gaming-on-the-go. 

Its comfortable, soft silicone rubber textured offer a sure – but comfortable – grip for hours of gaming.


This is the Game pad mould for prototyping only it's not for the production.

Where is Your Money Going?

I funded the prototype with my own money. But setting up a full manufacturing process is expensive — I can’t do it alone. Until I get large enough for huge orders.

Game pad in 2 colour will be UNLOCKED when the stretch goal go over $16,000, and you can perk for the 2 colour option.


Also we will be UNLOCKED Game pad in 2 colour only for the iPad mini when the stretch goal go over $25,000, and you can perk for the iPad mini option.


REWARDS


WHERE:

The company that will be responsible for Game pad manufacture is a well known established company renowned for their quality worldwide, with two major awards under their name (Red Dot Good Design Award & IF Design Award). When it comes to choosing a manufacturer, it is key for me to have quality, precision and schedule at the foremost of my design manufacture ethos. 



The Manufacturing Process of Game pad: Next Steps


I have already arranged for manufacturers in China to make Game pad from silicone. Once I secure the funding, I can pay for the material, tooling and finishing cost.

After each Game pad is finished and checked. Working with the manufacturer I have manufacturing schedules, assembly and packaging arranged. I have arranged everything I need to make Game pad a perfect product.

I plan to begin production as soon as I reach my goal so I can deliver as soon as possible. With your help it can be before schedule.

Thank you indiegogo, please support this project to make Game pad stand out from the crowd. We appreciate your help and support, so please spread the word to your friends and family on Facebook & Twitter. Look forward to rolling out Game pad to market. Thank you

story:
Hello!

      Let me tell you a little about myself, and this project. I'm Dave Vogt; I run operations at Gaming World Wide; a gaming group and website that focuses on charity, information, and entertainment. Beyond that, I hold several gaming world records, and have dabbled in independent game design for years. So, I'm bringing it all together. This title, The Bounty, is a unique, retro styled, high score based RPG. A roguelike with a classic arcade edge. It's meant to challenge the player, and inspire them to push their limits further. You start your game, and delve into the dungeon; everything you do rewards you with points. But there are no shops, no inns, no safehouses. Once you die, you die. You're awarded your score, and return to the title screen. Next time you might do better. Of course, you might end up in different levels this time.  Above all that? The game is being released for free. Featuring custom sprite work by Mike "NESQuester" Wright, we have the highest expectations of this game to bring you back to the old days, in a new way.

     Care to try it now? I've assembled a pre-alpha demo. This is proof of concept only; just enough to get the object of the game across, using all stock middleware RTP assets. You can find and download this demo here.

What We Need & What You Get

So, how much are we looking for? The lower end is $2500. This will cover a bare minimum of development costs such as hardware, software, and staff. Going up to a more desirable $4000 and beyond will get us custom chiptune music, more artwork, and more specialized hardware. Basically, a more awesome final product, and a framework to deliver new level packs and sequels in the future. 

  The perks really involve you in the development. Your contributions will have you designing levels in the dungeons, helping create items, and even becoming a playable character! I'll personally work with you to ensure maximum balancing and playability, so it's a fun and easy way to make a real creative contribution; a personal touch beyond a standard financial funding-for a perk. If you prefer promotional items, those are options as well, of course.

UPDATED: A little something else to say thank you to our backers; included in every perk is not only a timed early release of The Bounty, but also an exclusive level pack. This collection of fun special levels will be only released to indiegogo backers; though you can share if you want to. ;)

    We're aiming for a release date of December 1st, 2013. This could be delayed; whether there is a huge influx of fan created content, technical issues, or if additional debugging/QA testing is required. December 1st is the goal however, and video diaries will be recorded frequently, keeping you up to date on the progress.

     What if we don't reach our goal? A basic version of the game will be built. The art/music assets will be weaker, QA/bug testing will be limited; but there will be a well playing, quality game to be found!

The Impact

As AAA games get bigger and bigger, players are turning to independent games for those classic experiences the big studios don't bother with anymore. The Bounty is the real deal, with every detail painstakingly built and fine tuned by a world class competitor. To be able to present this experience to the world, free of charge... is beyond explanation. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, there's still plenty you can do to help make this a reality! Beyond indiegogo's sharing tools, you can hype up this project, pass it around to the people you know. Anything you can do is most appreciated.

story:
This Just In! is a bullethell shooter/RPG hybrid stuffed with humor, action and adventure, and set in an alternate 1920s America full of flappers, packed with plucky reporters and plagued by the prohibition of alcohol. Take control of three high-flying gals as they battle their own personal demons as well as a literal invasion of demons from the underworld. "Fight the demons without and within. Then your adventure shall truly begin" or so they say! Who says that? Not sure. But one thing is for sure, and that is that these girls have spunk! Spunk in spades!



                                    

There's Gabby, the plucky little reporter. Sporting a flying machine, a Smith and Wesson revolver, her trusty notebook and her signature "don't get fresh with me bucko!" attitude, this is one classy lassy. Having achieved worldwide fame during her first assignment as a reporter for the Jasper Gazette by inadvertently ending the greatest war the world had ever seen, Gabby was immediately "promoted" to spokeswoman of the paper. Unfortunately for her, this promotion means that she's doomed to public appearances and covering softball stories for the rest of her days. But when the demon invasion begins, she quickly finds herself caught right in the middle of a once-in-a-lifetime scoop for a second time! But will this time be the chance she needs to prove she belongs with her feet on the street walking the beat? Only time will tell, Gabby! Only time will tell!


                                      


Next up is ALICE. Definitely the most successful of the eccentric Dr. Felix’s inventions, ALICE is a walking, talking bonafide marvel of modern science. While she looks like something straight out of a Zip Johnson serial, make no mistake, she is no work of fiction! She is as real as you or I! Built with the power of flight and a whole slew of electrical mishaps that could be repurposed as weapons, she doesn’t sneeze at danger. And when her creator’s latest invention results in the accidental release of demons into the world, ALICE makes it her personal mission to stop the invading hordes and restore Dr. Felix’s honor. But what good could one mechanical girl do against the seemingly endless armies of the underworld? What good indeed?


                

                                      

       

Finally, there is Hilda. Gifted with the power of flight from birth thanks to her beautiful demonic wings... Wait... demonic? You read that right? Hilda is herself a demon princess. What is a demon princess doing fighting against her own kind? You must play the game to find out! OR, you can simply read on while I tell you! Hilda is the daughter of Lord von Wormheart, a man whose sometimes cruel treatment of his subjects rubs Hilda the wrong way. And even though he shows nothing but complete affection for her, she resents a ruler who would show favoritism to his family while throwing those who depend on his rule under the bus. But when his latest tirade has him marching an army against one of his own villages, she decides that is a line she will not let him cross, and so sets out to stop him.



                     

The core gameplay of This Just In! is bullethell horizontal shooting action, but with a twist. First of all, the three playable characters will have unique characteristics, governing their power, movement speed and other things. But these characters will be fully customizable with different equipment, costumes, and customizable skill trees.


 




Finding the game too difficult? Turn the difficulty slider down, or replay old levels to grind for experience. Or maybe it's too easy? Turn the difficulty slider up and enjoy more difficult bullet patterns, but also a better chance at finding more powerful, valuable loot. 



The choices are completely up to you. We want the game to reflect your personal playstyle and preferences as much as possible.

 

Or maybe you're the type of person who would like to compete for a high score in a completely controlled campaign free of RPG mechanics? Play through the arcade mode, a seperate experience with a simplified version of the story based on more traditional shooters, complete with high scores and continue credits.

 


But back to the main campaign mode. Each character will have her own side-scrolling hub town to explore in between levels. It is in this hub town that you will talk to NPCs, buy items to use on levels, buy and customize equipment and change skills.


And there are many more exciting details we will give in future updates, so please stay tuned!




                                                     

 

No Grapes Games is a group of three guys, and we all have day jobs. But making a game takes time, and making a quality game takes even more time. Which means that in order to make This Just In! the best game it can possibly be, and in a timely manner, we are going to have to take time off of our day jobs to make it happen.


We hate DRM as much as the next people, and as a result, This Just In! will proudly be DRM free for Linux, Windows and Android platforms.

 

If this is the kind of game you would like to play, or if you know someone who would be interested in playing it, please spread the word! Your support is greatly appreciated!

 

                         Who are we?

We are No Grapes Games, a new three-man game development team formed with the express purpose of making This Just In! We're all friends who grew up playing horizontal and vertical shooters, role-playing games and adventure games. With great passion for these genres, we decided it would be fun and worthwhile to combine our favorite aspects of these experiences into what we are calling This Just In!

Nathan Caldwell - Programmer

Andrew Caldwell - Writer

Justin Raimey - Artist

Here is an example of a horizontal shooter, Boogie Wings
