So, you get first and exclusive units of SmartBoards for funding us.
Our PCB will be manufactured through our vendor in Gujarat and the frontplate of switchboard will be manufactured in Maharashtra.
  The Impact Similar products in the market cost more than Rs. 50K for minimum setup. It normally includes a gateway and multiple devices connected to the same. A few lean products only operate on Bluetooth. SmartBoard connects directly to your Wi-Fi router and does not need any gateway. Also, it can control multiple devices. 2 sockets provided on the SmartBoard allow users to connect and control any arbitrary movable electronic devices. Predefined scenarios which give the users automated control, makes SmartBoard stand out from the herd.
Risks & Challenges  Since, this is a technology which is in the niche domain, the biggest challenge is to find early adopters of the technology. We have tried to make the SmartBoard a replacement of traditional switchboards keeping the dimensions the same. Since, we already have a prototype ready and working, we foresee minimal risk in delivering the products.  
MotivationThe Idea of 
SmartBoard originated due to the founder, Sandeep Gupta’s laziness, 
especially during Delhi winters. Sandeep realized that it is incredibly 
difficult to switch on the lights during the night especially when you 
are sleeping away from switch board. Also, there were a lot of redundant
 activities like turning off lights at 10 pm, reducing the fan speed in 
the middle of the night etc., which could easily be automated and 
provide better sleep patterns for users of such technology.AchievementHome-in-Hand
 was conceptualized at the start of 2014. It started with a prototype 
which was more or less a proof-of-concept.It was followed by a 2nd 
prototype in October 2014, which was better in terms of usability but 
still lagged aesthetically.Finally, the 3rd prototype was released in 
the first week of January 2015. It is the 3rd prototype for which we are seeking funding. The outer plate would be finer than what this prototype looks.

ScheduleHere is our expected execution schedule
Crowdfunding Campaign - Feb - Apr, 2015
Manufacturing - Apr - Jul, 2015
Delivery - Aug, 2015
Commercial manufacturing - Oct, 2015 onwards


What makes SmartBoard different?
We are not the only players in this field but certainly we are the first of the lot. We are offering features which are not yet available in competitors’ products. Also, the overall ownership price of this product is much less than other equivalent home-automation products which require supporting peripheral devices.It is not only 'cool' to control your home devices via your mobile app but also very convenient to automate a lot of regular stuff. It can also help to keep a watch on your kids and take care of old parents remotely. When you fund, you will help us bring this technology to the market and be one of the first customers of the same!Fine print


We ship only to India.

The perks may look a bit different from what has been shown in images above (the outer plate would look finer than the prototype)

We support only android phones as of now
The size of plate is 226mmx166mm (for wall grouted box size: 210mmx140mm)

We feel the above constraints would not be a hindrance for most of ourpotential investors and customers.Other Ways You Can HelpPlease share our campaign as much you can. Not only us, they will thank you as well!! FAQ
Q: Wait, you are asking me for Rs 5 lakhs?
A: No, not at all. Whatever you contribute, starting from $1, would provide a great support to us. We recommend you to go for $85 (approx Rs 5000) perk which will give you a SmartBoard.
Q: You mention, 'it's all or nothing' in video, however, I see this is a flexible funding campaign?
A: True, while we made the video it was supposed to be a 'fixed funding' campaign. However, due to technical issue on Indiegogo with reimbursements to India, we had to go for flexible funding.
Q: Why are all contributions in USD?
A: Indiegogo is an international platform and does not have an INR option. If you use Indian credit card, you would still be billed in INR, finally.
Q: Does it connect to my wifi router?
A: Yes, SmartBoard connects to wifi router and is then available to be controlled via internet from your mobile app.
Q: How can I install this board?
A: Installation is 2 step procedure - (a) Wall mounting - This is trivial and can be done by any qualified electrician. (b) Blinkup - Connecting to your wifi router. This would be done with the help of mobile app. Refer to here and here for more details. Detailed step-by-step procedure would be provided along with SmartBoard.
Q: Do I need to pay anything for shipping?
A: No, shipping is included. Please note, we ship only within India.
Q: Are there any future enhancements planned?
A: Yes, what we have prepared is the base for an IoT application. Currently, you can control manually. On the automation part, you can have schedule rules to run automatically. Further, we plan to enhance this to a generic rule engine. Imagine, you have to catch an early morning flight in winters and your geyser turns on automatically at an appropriate time, so that when you enter the bath you get hot water. But on regular days, the geyser turns on only at your office time. On hardware front, we plan to enhance it with a universal remote, so that your TV, STB, AC also become controllable.
For more, please read here.

story:
No matter where you pay with your new, exclusive credit card – the PremiumSilver-Card – from now on your purchase is rewarded with real silver. World-wide, in more than 210 countries and at more than 35 million points of acceptance.

    ✓ No non-transparent points

    ✓ No non-transparent systems

    ✓ Simply collect real silver

    ✓ Benefit from the increasing silver price

For every purchase, you receive your credit of silver on your own secured SilverDepot. You can check your silver balance 24/7 with your personal password. Also mobile and at any time with our free SilverBonusApp. So you are always up-to-date and can follow your transactions even better.

Your personal Silver Account is stored and kept safe by our partner, a trusted precious metal trading house. Your silver, highly safeguarded in secure safes and highly insured.


The principle is very simple: You pay your purchase with the PremiumSilverCard wich is linked to your existing bank account. The merchant receives the payment and offers you a direct discount in form of real silver which is transferred to your personal depot.

You can check your depot with your smartphone or on our website. Already up from a silver amount of 100 gram you can have your precious silver sent to your home.

Everyone knows customer loyalty systems with opaque points systems or cheap premiums - and many people are tired of collecting those worthless points.

The result: In 2011 we developed and published a customer loyalty system based on 1 gram silver bullion with a additional chance to win attractive prices in our daily lottery. 

This system named "SilberBonus" successfully passed our local test markets in Germany and was accepted by young and old. With this experience we developed it further and now take it to the next level.


The "PremiumSilverCard" is the evolution of "SilberBonus" with a lot of benefits. The development is well advanced and almost ready to launch.

Some facts about the PremiumSilverCard and what is ready so far:

  • Easy to use hardware - Everyone knows how to handle a plastic card.
  • Our app (worth 125,000 €) is almost ready to use and in its final beta tests.
  • A detailed marketing & business plan is worked out and completed.
  • The Fontys International Business School has developed a consulting report.
  • The personal silver accounts are set up and waiting for Owners.
  • The card manufacturer is ready to produce your PremiumSilverCard.


We have developed the base, marked out the framework and negotiated with key partners. What we need you for is to share this project - its idea - and to implement the technical requirements.

We want to provide this unique card to you world-wide and it is a long way, but we are half way there.


We can only deliver the credit card if the funding goal is reached. 

If the target is not reached, we still continue to pursue the launch of the PremiumSilverCard, but have to expect a slightly delayed schedule.


If you like this idea and want to support us but can't afford to back us, please spread this project and tell your friends - or even your foes.

You can do so by using the tools by Indigogo, right below our video at the top of this page.


You have further questions?

We are happy to respond to your questions about the PremiumSilverCard, our company or this indigogo campaign: indigogo@premiumsilvercard.de

MasterCard® and the MasterCard® logo are registered trademarks of MasterCard International Incorporated.
The trademark was only used for demonstration purposes.

story:
How did it happen.

Twisted Metal & Vigilante 8. Later on I found Crashday and Ex Machina. That was fun. Rolling around with armored beasts of destruction, making choices between speed, armor and firepower. Many years later i remembered those and searched for similar, modern games. Guess what i found? Nothing. Since i was heavily into modding this time i decided to give it a try. To make my own game. It went pretty well but my reallife forced me to stop it. Now i am back at it. I am wiser, more experienced. I really got the feeling i can do it this time. But like you could guess i need your help. I don't need to buy motivation but i need to buy, time, equipment, and skills.

What will happen.

I will develop a game of a forgotten genre. Vehicular combat game. I am planning to use the power of the Unreal Engine to realise this. Expect big maps, awesome effects and ofcourse tons of metal formed to different tools that can be used to obliterate your opponents. The more money i can collect - the more features you can expect from this just after the release. Customisable vehicles, weapons, new vehicle classes. 

    The Vehicles.

    For now i have  three tiers of vehicles.
    Makeshift Tier.
    These are non military vehicles converted to use them like ones. Tractors, excavators, trucks. Armed mostly with low tech weaponry they are cheap and sturdy. 
    Military Tier.
    These are vehicles that could be used for regular combat. Tanks, artillery, jeeps. Armed with conventional ballistic based weaponry they are just the middle tier in everything. 
    Prototype Tier.
    Most advanced vehicles with prototype weaponry, prototype engines, prototype armor. Hover tanks, railgun artillery, energy shields. Very expensive but of course very efficient.
    Now those 3 tiers are divided into classes. First i will describe the calsses that will definitly make it into the game, thereafter i describe the two that need more time to make them function correctly and will be included at the release only if enough funds raised.
    Light class:
    Vehicles used for intercepting and spotting enemy vehicles. Performance of their weaponry may vary but all of them are fast and agile. 
    Medium class:
    Use them to protect keypoints and to attack from unexpected positions. Still fast, but can take a lot more of punishment.
    Heavy class:
    Slow, armored, powerful. Can push enemies back by their brute force. Take a lot of damage before they blow up.

    Special classes:

    Ultraheavy class:
    Very slow fortresses armed to the top with weapons fo every task. One of them is able to turn the whole game around. The other team needs to coordinate their actions to ever stop such a beast from destroying their base.

    Flying class:
    This class will afford changes to other classes aswell since they will need to be able to counter them. With this class every other class gets anti air vehicles too. 

    Please take a look to the gallery and spread the word! Cheers!

story:
• “Sick of expensive Real Estate Agency fees”

  • “Frustrated with your Property Agents not updating you regularly”

  • “Do you QUESTION your Property Agents ability”

  • “Do you feel YOU could do a better job, if only you knew the legislation”

  • “Want access to the major websites Real Estate agents use to rent / sell quicker”

  • “Are you just Fed up with your agents attitude ”


    There is another professional solution – “INTERESTED” Then please read on...


    People are spending more and more time looking at their phones instead of talking on their phones these days.  I have designed an exciting new approach to Property Services.  This one touch system which will allow even the novice to become a property professional by simple owning a phone, tablet, or having access to the internet.


    IMAGINE you had a personal property professional to carry around with you in your shirt pocket or handbag, anytime, anywhere, you could get the information you need about your investment property at an instant, without purchasing any expensive gadget and without studying any of the legislation.

    Now IMAGINE this personal property professional was made available to the individual property investor, that is cost effective, in fact, I guarantee this system will cost the investor up to and more than 80% less in management fees than what they are paying right now.  There are a lot of different software packages out there that are only made available to the Real Estate offices, to improve their profits and efforts, yet they are still unable to complete the tasks at the correct time, due to lack of time, experience.  WHO loses out!!! Hmm.

    What makes my system so different from all the others?
    My system allows all investors / property owners to have control over their investment property, not just the Real Estate Offices, it will supply all legal documents in the correct order needed to start the tenancy, end a tenancy and all other documents necessary throughout the tenancy.  Everything and anything happening on the property regards to rent, repairs, and requests are delivered to the owner at an instant, and actioned quicker than any property agent could.  Better still all rent payments, repairs and requests are on file forever, they cannot be lost or deleted. Up until now no system this detailed has been made available to the owners due to Real Estate agents wanting their business and let’s face it they aren't going to tell you, you can do it yourself. Most important - No more waiting on rental payments until the end of the month.

    What are your reasons for using a Real Estate office for your property?
    Investors use Real Estate agents due to lack of knowledge of the Residential Tenancy laws and how to action accordingly.  The investors feel a sense of security believing everything is ok and your house is in good hands, due to the sales pitch given.  The investor believe by using a Real Estate office they will get a better quality tenant, there is an element of truth in that but it should not be taken as fact.  The best person for the job is YOU!, who else will look after your property better than you.  To an agency you are just another number and an increase in their weekly income.  Sorry to be a little in your face, but it’s the truth.  Agencies have programs similar to help them complete the actions in a timely manner, however due to lack of time and hands available, completing these tasks in accordance to the law can get missed, forgotten or however they describe it to you.  Even with the help of this programs they still allow a tenant to be 4 weeks behind, breeches not remedied, lease renewals not signed, by the time the owner finds out it’s too late and either leaves the owner without a tenant without warning, or worse a tenant still living in the house without payment. 

    What do we need for this system to work for us?
    All an owner needs is a smart phone and / or a home computer, iPad, tablet etc.  So no unnecessary spending needed, you can use what you already have.  The system will still run even if you don’t have a smart phone, but you will need to have access to a computer with internet. Then all you do is, READ, APPROVE, DECLINE, MORE INFO, and SEND.  Sounds easy enough doesn’t it.  Everything else will prompt you and be automatically actioned in the correct time frame and within the law.  Not only that you will have ME as your Property Professional helping you. 

    Just a quick FAQ’s

    Hey! I am and Interstate / overseas owner, can I still use the system?
    Yes! I will have support professionals all around to carry out inspections, letting, routine and ending.  But this will come at an additional cost, but I assure you it will be far cheaper than what you are paying now.  If you are interested in holding the discounted spot and to be notified when an agent becomes available please donate under Interstate & oversea owners.

    I want the savings but don’t want to meet the tenants?
    As above, Yes, the savings still there and professionals all around to carry out all inspections at an additional cost.

    Documents will be sent to my address, I don’t want the tenants to know where I live.
    I will intercept all documents that are sent, and forward back to you at no extra costs to protect your privacy?

    I’m not a skilled computer nut is your software very easy use?
    Yes, if you can send emails, text and complete forms on computer very easy.

    Now! To sum up?
    This is a highly professional system with high security NOT available at any Real Estate Office, with no locked in contract.  Invented / designed by a property professional, researched by a property professional, and sold by a property professional.  There are many more features, far too many to list, reporting at its very best.  Believe me you won’t be disappointed.  Do not be fooled by cheap knock offs posing as the real thing.  Donate Today to help bring a needed professional solution.

    Without question, I have designed the most superior, executive property professional system ever, that’s got it all, it will be very EASY to use, and without the enormous agency fees saving the investor money a receiving a highly professional job.  We’re all looking for ways to save money in Today’s economy for some that may mean take control of their investment property.  Well now they can have their cake and eat it too, they can now have your property professional without the price tag, you will NEVER have to research who is the best agent in town ever again. The Best agent in Town is YOU! Take control NOW!  You are not likely to come across a property agent of this superiority in any Real Estate office, unless there has been an advancement in the Robotic humans that I am unaware of.

    So PLEASE help me by donating today to a much needed professional solution for
    cheaper Real Estate agency fees, Quality and excellence 24/7 GUARANTEED!

    The Property Sales Platform has been designed which will be made available at the launch.  NO COMMISSION on property sales.

    Just CLICK on one of the perks below and help me bring this software into reality.

story:
Project: Insidious is a Open World Horror Survival Game. The aim of the game is to explore and at the same time stay in the right state of mind to survive! Whilst exploring, you'll encounter some ferocious hounds and creatures! Throughout, you'll come across certain resources and objects which you can use to craft weapons. And build bases Just remember. YOU are NOT alone!
Vote, Rate, Favorite us on STEAM Greenlight, http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=304321725

Project: Insidious has thus far been funded. It would be nice to continue development on our own but we were out of funds and we've run into some costs which would be a hard without the support of you guys. We're asking for your help to finish the game and not doing it as a small team but together as a community.

With this money we plan to put it to the following uses:
  • Buying engine/license fees (engine, sound tools, software licenses, etc.)
  • Buying Animation Assets to Improve In-Game
  • Better Models/Graphics
  • Better Assets Visual/Audio
  • Buy Legal License on Unity 4
  • Website & Forum
  • Expand our initial reach with marketing
  • Server costs for Multiplayer

YOU are NOT alone!Vote, Rate, Favorite us on STEAM Greenlight, http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=304321725

Project: Insidious has thus far been funded. It would be nice to continue development on our own but we were out of funds and we've run into some costs which would be a hard without the support of you guys. We're asking for your help to finish the game and not doing it as a small team but together as a community.With this money we plan to put it to the following uses:
Buying engine/license fees (engine, sound tools, software licenses, etc.)
Buying Animation Assets to Improve In-Game
Better Models/Graphics
Better Assets Visual/Audio
Buy Legal License on Unity 4
Website & Forum
Expand our initial reach with marketing
Server costs for Multiplayer

story:
-Windlands now available in Steam-


Grapple your way through a dangerous half-ruined world inhabited by giant war golems.





If Windlands receives any extra money, it will be spent on building new levels, creating bosses and new characters for the game.

**REACHED**  :)

We'll add some NPCs to give the world some context and make it feel more alive.

Racing from point A to point B in the least amount of time to challenge your skill and speed!

Could be a multiplayer of the core game, challenge mode, or just a sandbox – we haven't decided yet. For 2-4 players.

Simple editor for creating short challenge levels.



Windlands is an action adventure in the vein of Shadow Of The Colossus and Zelda, but adapted for VR.

The game takes advantage of the Oculus Rift technology to make you feel like a superhero as you make huge jumps, swing in the air by the grappling hook and walk along narrow ledges. It is all about movement, exploration and mastering your skills on the way to the final epic battle. 

The essential elements of the gameplay are:

•  Freedom of Movement

•  Exploration

•  Fighting Gigantic Bosses

You play as the last automaton created in a desperate attempt to fight war machines and end the war. The goal is to find and destroy the source powering all the golems. Your adventure starts from a hub where you choose a destination. Each destination level is themed so you will find yourself in a different environment every time: in a desert, underground, on a flying island, in a ruined town, etc.  Your goal is to explore the level and find your way to the level boss. After defeating it, you will collect an item for the final fight. Once you are heroically done with all the level bosses, use all the collected items to unlock the ultimate battle for the future of the world.

Core mechanics

•  Grappling Hook - These are essentially your arms. Except 30 meters long :)

•  Super Jump - Gather speed and jump across vast expanses.

•  Wall Jump - Use to reach impossible heights jumping from wall to wall.

At this stage of working on the game we have player movement mechanic done but the boss battles are missing. This huge essential part of the game will be accomplished if this campaign is successful. In the campaign updates we will post what we have in mind for bosses and battle scenes and some concept art. 


An original soundtrack will be composed by Simo Sainio (a.k.a. Bureau of Broken Sounds). Take a listen to get a feel for the atmosphere the game is shooting for:




At the moment there is just over 70 minutes of music earmarked for the game. All of it might not find a place in the final release, but some new tracks will probably be made in their stead. The soundtrack you get through the perks should then feature at least one hour of music, likely more.


Two reasons, basically:

•  For us this campaign is a way to understand if the growing VR audience would enjoy a game like Windlands. If you show interest in the game and support us, we will carry on with this project and will gloriously accomplish the task. No pressure, but the future of Windlands literally depends on you : )

•  If this Indiegogo campaign is successful we will be able to hire people to help us  with art and design to make Windlands a truly amazing experience.


Important Notice:

According to Finnish law companies are not allowed to accept donations without compensation. This means we cannot accept contributions without perks. If you want to contribute, please select a perk on the right. Thanks a million!


If Windlands receives any extra money, it will be spent on building new levels, creating bosses and new characters for the game.

$15000 Extra Level

$20000 NPCs and Extra Level

$25000  Challenge Mode


 Player movement mechanics  are completed but the boss battles are still missing.  In the campaign updates we will post what we have in mind for bosses and battle scenes and some concept art.  


Contact us on Facebook or tweet us if you have any questions or feedback. We would love to hear from you!


Is there a word in any Earth language to describe how grateful we will be if you spread a word about our campaign and encourage your friends to try out our demo? No, there isn't.

You can help us so much by tweeting, sharing and talking about Windlands!

Please, visit our website and join the fan base on Facebook.

You can join Windlands discussions, get involved, talk to the production team,  by following us on Twitter.

Thank you so much for getting involved!

story:
We are Aitch and Saddo, a couple of Romanian artists/illustrators passionate about  everything naturey and we enjoy working together each time we get the chance. 

This March we took a trip to Berlin and in the apartment we rented for a few days we discovered a simple but fun little game - a memory game that we could not wait to play as soon as we got back from the city. We were hooked :)

Returning home, to Romania, we decided to make our own version of a memory game, with hand painted illustrations of stuff we love: flowers, plants, birds, animals, patterns. 

So this is how the prototype came to life, and besides being visually appealing it’s also such a great way to spend time with one or a big bunch of friends. It’s fun and challenging for kids and adults alike, and the more you play the crazier your memory gets. 


Aitch & Saddo Memory Game

The set is a collaborative work between Aitch and Saddo, it contains 48 cards with 24 unique illustrations printed on pieces of thick cardboard, sized 9 cm x 9 cm, which makes them easy to handle.


We are having this fundraiser in order to support the costs of production for 30 - 50 sets, and the perks for the contributors consist of 20 original illustrations, painted with watercolours or acrylics on paper, or the game itself after it’s produced. 


Thank you so much for helping out!

H+S
